176b4(gso rig): meng par ni// kun zhugs pa yis nub byed las// mau ni myur du gdon par bya// zhes bya ba la/ de bas ni sman paste kun tu zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i nad mi bzang bras zin cing sdug ba 'dam du bying ba'i mi myur du gdon
176b5(gso rig): par bya ste/ de yang dper na mtsho shon tu zab cing rtogs par dka' la/ chu sbyin byis pa gsod pa la sogs pa'i srog chags/ gdug pa myang pos gang ba'i nu mdzings pha rol tu bye 'jug ngogs med par nub par gyur
176b6(gso rig): pa dag ni/ nyam nga ba'i gnas yin pas myur du gdon dgos pa dang 'dra'o// rigs pas rten dang bral ba'i chang 'thungs pas/ myos dregs khro dang dngang ba'i rang bzhin can// yongs su 'khyud gyur cing /
177a1(gso rig): rigs dang mi rigs mnyam par byed par 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ chang rigs shig 'os par bsten pa dang bral ba ste 'og nas smos pa'i stobs dang dus la sogs pa dang / sgyur ba med pa ni/ rigs
177a2(gso rig): bar bsten pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba ste/ de lta bu'i rigs pa ro bsten pa med par tshong 'thungs pas ni myos pa la sogs pa rang gi ste/ lus dang lhan cig skyes pa'i dgra po 'jig rten 'dir du phyi ma'i yon tan/ 'joms shing
177a3(gso rig): 'phrog par byed pas dgra bo ltar gnod par byed pa'i dgra po rnams kyis yongs su 'khyud par gyur cing shin tu btsir bar gyur pa ma yin zhing / de bzhin du rigs dang mi rigs pa cha mnyam zhing mtshungs pa nyid du sems
177a4(gso rig): par 'gyur po ste/ bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa'i bye brag phyed par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don no// stobs dang dus dang yul dang gom pa dang // rang bzhin phyogs dang na tshong nang rnams ni// legs brtags de dang rjes mthun
177a5(gso rig): gang zhig 'thung // de ni bdud rtsi 'thungs drung mtshungs pa yin// zhes bya ba lnga/ lus kyi nyams stobs dang / dus lnga sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dam bzhin blo legs par rtogs zhing so sor phyed nas de dang mthun pa ste de dang
177a6(gso rig): deng tsham par skyes bu gang zhig tshang ran cing dus la bab par 'thung so pa de ni bdud rtsi 'thungs pa dang mtshungs pa yin te/ skyes bu rigs pa dang ldan par 'thungs pas gnod pa med cing lus bde bar bying ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir
177b1(gso rig): yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa chog go don gyi zla zar zhes bya ba/ slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar bA las/ nang gzhi'i gnas le'u drug pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//
177b2(gso rig): de nas gzhang 'brum gyi nang gzhi bshad par bya'o// zhes bya ba la/ ji ltar kun tu zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i nad bshad ma thag pa de ni srog gi gnas snying la brten cing 'byung ba de bzhin du/ 'dir yang srog gi gnas gzhang la
177b3(gso rig): brten te 'byung bas na srog gi gnas la brten par chos mthun pa'i phyir/ de'i 'og du de 'di brtsams pa yin no// dgra ltar srog chags rnams kyi tshe// gzhang 'byam byung bsu gsong byed pas/ de phyir bshang ba'i lam 'gegs
177b4(gso rig): ba/ gzhang 'brum zhes ni bshad pa yin// zhes bya ba la/ gzhang 'brum ni gzhang khar sha'i mdzar pa sbom po skyes pa yin la/ de ni dgra po ltar srog chags rnams kyi tshe 'phrog cing gzhang 'brum du skyes pas gsod
177b5(gso rig): par byed pa'i phyir nges pa'i tshig gi tshul gyis na/ gzhang 'brum zhes bya'o// nad kyis pags tshil sha rnams ni// gnod byas dbyibs ni sna tshogs pas// sha yi myug gu gzhung sogs su// skyes de gzhang 'brum yin par
177b6(gso rig): bshod/ ces bya ba la/ nad ces bya ba ni rlung la sogs pa ste/ des bogs pa dang tshil dang sha rnams la gnod cing ma rung bar byos nas// dbyibs dang kha dog sna tshigs shing tha dad pa'i sha'i myu gu sha mdzer sbom po lta bu
178a1(gso rig): gnod pa sna tshogs skyed pa gzhang la sogs par skyes shing byung bar gyur pa de la ni gzhang 'brum gyi nad ces bya ba yin par drang srong rnams kyis bshad// lhan cig skyes drang phyis byung dang / skam dang khrag
178a2(gso rig): tu 'dzag pa yi// dbye bas mdor na rnam gnyis yin/ zhes bya ba la/ gzhang 'brum gyi nad du ni mdor na rnam pa gnyis yin te/ la la ni skyes nas lhan cig skyes te byung ba yin la/ la la ni skyes nos phyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / yang
178a3(gso rig): de bzhin du skam pa dang gsher ba'i dbye bas kyang rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te/ la la ni skam por gnas pa yin la/ la la ni khrag 'dzag pa dang bcas pa yin no// gzhung ni rgyu ma sbom por brten/ sor ni phyed dang lnga yod do// zhes bya ba la/
178a4(gso rig): gzhung ni rgyu ma'i zhabs rgyu ma sbom pa la brten cing gnas lnga de'i tshad ni sor phyed dang lnga yod pa yin no// dwer ni nyer gsum sor ni phyed dang gnyis// zhes bya ba la/ grazhang de ni gnyer ma'i rim pa gsum re rI zhing sor phyed dang gnyis yod do// rim pa
178a5(gso rig): de'i nang mi ni// phyir 'bul bar ma sel ba yin// nga yi phyi rol 'dzums pau yis// zhes bya ba la// rim pa de rnams kyi rims pa nAd ma 'am/ phugs ma ni dri ma rnams phyar 'bul zhing 'bab par byed pa yin+do la/ gnyer ma'i rim pa bar ma
178a6(gso rig): ni dri ma rnams sol cing phyir 'byin pa yin pas na sel po zhes bya la/ phyi rol gyi gnyer mo ni dri ma la sogs pa mi 'byung bar sdom zhing 'dzums par byed pas na 'dzums po zhes bya'o// de yi phyir phyi rol sor cig kha// nas ni phyed dang
178b1(gso rig): gnyis kyis chad// nga phran chad ni sku skye 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ 'dzums pa de'i phyi rol sor gcig ni gzhang kha zhes bya la/ gzhung kha de'i tshad ni nas phyed dang gnyis kyi tshad yin no// gzhang khwa'i tshig de thams cad ni rkub tu sgyu skye bar
178b2(gso rig): 'gyur ro// de la lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyu// gnyer mi'i sa bon gnod 'gyur nyid// gzhang 'brum zhes bya ba la/ de la lhan cig skyes pa dang phyis 'byung ba'i gzhang 'brum gnyis las/ lhan cig skyes pa'i gzhang 'brum 'byung ba'i rgyu ni
178b3(gso rig): gnyer ma de 'byung zhing dang por skyes pa nyid kyi tshe// de'i sa bon khu khrag la sogs pa la rlung la sogs por gnod par gyur pa de nyid las gnang 'brum 'byung ba'o// sa bon gnod pa yang / pha mas mi 'phrod zos pa dang // sngon las zhes
178b4(gso rig): bya ba la/ sa bon de la gnod par byed pa'i rgyu ni rnam pa gnyis te/ pha dang mas kha zas mi 'phrod pa gzhang 'brum skyed pa byed pa'i rgyu zos pa dang / snron bdag nyid kyi de lta bu'i gnas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa'o// de
178b5(gso rig): gnyis dang 'dus pa/ 'khrugs pa las gyur de de ga ni/ gsor mi rung ba nyid du bshad/ ces bya ba la/ pha dang mo'i gnod pa'i rgyu dang / sngon gyi las de gnyis dang / nang gzhi 'dus par 'khrugs po gang yin pa las gyur pa
178b6(gso rig): de dag ni gang gi phyir gsor mi rung ba nyid yin te/ lhan cig skyes pa yin pa'i phyir ro// rims byung kun de nas dang 'dra// zhes bya ba la/ nad gzhan gang yang rung ba kun kyang de 'dra ste/ dang po lhan cig skyes pa ni gser mi rung
179a1(gso rig): ngo zhes tshig 'dis ston pa yin no// lhan cig skyes pa khyad par du// rtsub cing brta bar dka' ba dang // nang du kha bltar ga/ ba dang // bla gnyan myi bzad can gso dka'// zhes bya ba la/ lhan cig sgyus
179a2(gso rig): pa'i gzhang 'brum de yang khyad par 'di dag dang ldan na lhag pur gso dka' ste/ reg po rtsub par gnas pa dang // brta zhing brtag par dka' ba dang // kha nang du lte zhing phyir ma phyogs pa dang // kha dog dkar ba dang / bla gnyen gyi nod
179a3(gso rig): mi bzad pa yod pa ni gso dka' zhing btsas su mi rung ba yin no// cig shos drug ste nad pa dang / 'dres pa dang 'dus pa khrag las byung / zhes bya ba la/ lhan cig 'byung ba las cig shos su gyur pa'i phyis 'byung ba'i gzhang
179a4(gso rig): 'brum ni rnam pa drug yod de/ nAd tha dad pa las byung ba gsum dang 'dres pa las byung ba dang 'dus pa las byung ba dang khrag las byung ba'o// rlung dang bad kan+da gnyis las skam/ khrag dang mkhris pa las rlan can/ zhes bya ba
179a5(gso rig): la/ de la gzhang 'brum skam po khrag mi 'dzag pa ni rung dang bad kan gnyis 'dus pas zin pA las 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzhang 'brum rlan can khrag 'dzag pa ni khrag dang mkhris pa 'dres pa sna zin pa las 'byung ba la 'gyu ro//
179a6(gso rig): nad rnams ldang rgyu sngar bshad pa// zhes bya ba la/ nad rnams ldang zhing 'drug pa'i rgyu gang yin pa ni sngar bod kyi tha~Md kyi gzhi bshad pa'i skabs su bshad cing bstan pa yin no// 'khrug pa de yis khong pa yi// me drod nyam
179b1(gso rig): shing bshad pa 'phel// gzhan yang nyal rab drags dang / gzhon pa khong 'khrugs bstan drag ni// ma snyoms sra dang tsog pur 'dug/ 'jam rtsi gtsi'u sa dang ni// rdo dang gos kyis blud pa dang // shin tu grang ba'i chus bkrus dang // rtag
179b2(gso rig): tu 'khru bar byed pa dang // bshad dang gci dang phyen gyi shugs// bkag dang nan gyis btsir ba dang // rims dang sman dang tshad par 'khrug/ 'or nad skya rbab be'u stabs kyis// skems byas gnod par 'gyur ba yi// spyod pa bstan
179b3(gso rig): las gnod par 'gyur// bud med zla grangs ma tshong 'phyil// zla ba rdzogs sogs gzir las 'byung // de dang 'dra ba gzhan yang rung // thur sel 'khrugs pas dri mi ni// gzhang gi gnyer mor de bzhag pas// der ni mi mngon gyur
179b4(gso rig): las gnas// gzhang 'brum 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin// zhes bya ba la/ nad ldang ba'i rgyu des khang pa'i me drod nyams shing bri la bshad pa zhes bya ba'i dri ma 'phel bar byed pa dang / rgyu gzhan yang bud med la 'khrig pa spyad pa'i
179b5(gso rig): nyal po drags par byas pa dang bzhin pa las khong 'khrugs pa ste/ rta la sogs pa'i bzhon pa ma sbyin pas g.yengs shing 'khrugs par bya bo dang / stan mtho dam nr-i ma snyoms po la 'dug pa dang snyun smra ba la 'dug pa dang /
179b6(gso rig): rtag tu cog pur 'dug pa dang / 'dzam rtsi gce'u legs par ma btang bas snang ba dang / sa gzhi dang ji la sogs pas drung de snang bar byas po dang / shin tu rgyun mi 'chad par chu drad mos bkrus shing rig par byas pa dang /
180a1(gso rig): rtag par rgyun du 'khru bar byed pa dang / bshad pa la sogs pa'i shugs 'byung ba bklag cing brnag pa dang / de dag nyid mi 'byung bzhin du nan gyis btsir ba dang / rims la sogs pa'i nad kyis
180a2(gso rig): skyem zhing rid par byas pa dang / lus la sogs pa gnod cing gdung bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi spyod pa bsten pa ste/ de dag las gzhang 'brum 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yang bud med rnams la ni nad de dag gi steng du zla ba ma tshang
180a3(gso rig): zhing / mngal na gnas pa'i sems can skye ba'i dus la ma bab cing 'phyel ba dang zla ba rdzogs shing tshang ba la 'dug kyang der gzir pa ste/ gnod pa dang bcas par bu btsas pa las gzhang 'bum 'byung bar 'gyuraro// nad kyi rgyu
180a4(gso rig): de 'dra ba de dag dang / rnam pa gzhan yang thur du sel ba zhes bya ba'i rlung 'khrugs shing gnod par gyur pas dri ma sogs par byed de/ gzhang gi gnyer ma'i gnas su bkag nas gnas par byed la/ des ni gzhang gi gnya
180a5(gso rig): ma de rnams su ni mi mngon blar gnas shing gasdeb du zhugs po de dag rul par 'gyur ba'i gnod pas nyen nas gzhang 'brum skyes par 'gyur ba yin no// de yis sngon tshul me drod nyams// brla ni rengs shing na ba dang /
180a6(gso rig): byin pa'i nyan mgo 'khor zhing // yan lag na zhing mig gnyis skra// bshang ba 'khru 'am yang na ni// rlung chen nang na 'khyil ba dang // phal cher lte ba'i 'og na rgyu// nad bcas bcad pa lta bur sems// rkang par 'byung
180b1(gso rig): zhing sgra can 'byung // rgyu ma krug krug zer zhing sgo// skem zhing sgregs pa mang du 'byung // gcin mang bshang nyung yi gA 'chus// sgregs pa dud 'dra sbyar ba 'byung // mgo dang rgyu ba dang brang du gzer// skom zhing kha dog nyams pa
180b2(gso rig): dang slong bag dbang po nyams chung la// khro zhing bsnyen bkur dka' ba dang // mra zhu skem nad sgyu rbab dang // dmu rdzings rnams la som nyi skye/ zhe sa bya ba la/ gzhung 'brum de rnams kyi sngon du byung ba'i tshul lam/ gzugs
180b3(gso rig): ni pho ba'i me drod nyams zhing bri ba dang / brla thog thag na ba dang / byin pa gnyis kyi nya bcus pa snyom du sems shing na ba la sogs pa dang / bshang po ched 'ga' ni 'khru zhing sle lnga/ ched 'ga' ni sri zhing rtug skam du 'byung
180b4(gso rig): pa dang / rlung che zhing mang ba dang / rgyu ba'i lam bklag pas nad nang du 'khyil zhing mi thon pa dang / de nyid kyis nu phal char nad lte ba'i nAd na rgyu zhing zug pa dang / phan tshun gzir bA'i nad dang bcas pa dang / rgyu ma'i nad kun tu
180b5(gso rig): bcad pa snyam du sems pa dang / 'byung bar dka' zhing thogs la 'byung ba na yang sgra can du 'byung ba dang / rgyu ma'i nang phan tshun klul krul zer zhing 'khrog pa dang dob pa dang / skem zhing ring pa la sogs pa dang / sgregs pa
180b6(gso rig): dud pa dang 'dra bar dku par 'ong zhing sgyur bar 'byung ba dang / mgo la sogs pa gzer zhing na ba dang / snyoms zhing na ba dang las la mi brtson pa dang / kha dog nyams pa ste/ thal ba'i rang bzhin gyi kha dog las gzhan du
181a1(gso rig): gyur pa med pa dang spro ba med pa dang / dbang po nyam chung zhing rang rang gi las la 'jug pa mi nus pa dang / khro zhing sems 'khrug pa dang / bsnyen bkur dka' zhing sdug bsngal bas bsnyen bkur bya
181a2(gso rig): dgos pa dang / ma zhu ba nas dmu rdzing gi bar gyi nad rnams yod par som nyid skyes zhing dgos par 'gyur ba yin no// gzhang 'brum skyes par 'gyur ba la 'di dag nyid ni 'phel bar 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ gzhang 'brum gyi nod
181a3(gso rig): skyes shing / 'byung bar gyur pa la/ sngar byung ba'i tshul gyis rtags 'di dag nyid 'phel zhing de'i tshul gsal pa nyid du 'gyur ro// de'i 'og gi lam bkag pas/ thur du sel ba'i rlung ldog ste/ lus dang dbang po kun gnas
181a4(gso rig): pa'i// rlung gzhan thams cad 'khrugs par byed// de bzhin bshang gci mkhris pa dang / bad kan lus zungs rten bcas pa// 'khrug cing me drod nyams par byed/ ces bya ba la/ gzhang 'bum de yis 'og gi lam bshang sgo zhes
181a5(gso rig): bya ba bkag pas thur du sel ba'i rlung 'byung por rdog pa na lam bkag pa'i phyir rlung de slar ldog par byed la/ de ltar ldog pa des lus dang dbang po'i tshigs kun la gnas shing brtan pa'i rlung dang me dang mnyam du gnas pa
181a6(gso rig): dang / khyab byed dang stod du rgyu ba dang / srog ces bya ba thams cad gakhrugs cing g.yo bar byed pa la de bzhin du bshang gci la sogs pa rten nam gnas dang bcas pa dang 'khrug cing g.yo bar byed la/ khong pa'i mi drod kyang nyams
181b1(gso rig): par byed do// zhes bya bar sbyar ro// de nas gzhang 'bum nAd can la/ phalnga cher thams cad nyer byung ba// skem zhing mchog tu bskyod mi nus// stobs zang khong rgyu bzhin mdangs nyams// lus lhod snying po med 'gyur zhing // 'bus zos pa yi
181b2(gso rig): shing 'dra la// p+la gr-i nyan mo lus dag gis 'debs// ji skad bshad pa'i nad gzir cing // lud pa skom dang skad 'gags dang // khas ro mi tshor cha ma 'do bos spo// sgyid skyur rkang lag na zhing slon// skyid pa skrangs dang rims nad dang /
181b3(gso rig): khu ba zad cing raba'i ba 'on// rde'u chags nad kyis gzir ba dang // skad 'gags zhum la sems khyod chud// mchil ma mang 'dor yi ge 'chus// rus tshigs kun dang snying lta ba// gzhang dang sna rtsor gzer dang bcas// gzhung nas
181b4(gso rig): 'bru ni ma smin bcas// khu ba lta bu'i sbyin bag 'dzag/ rtug skam sbyin pa 'am sla bar 'gyur// smin dang ma smin par bar 'khru// skya zhing ser dang sngon po yi// khrug ni sbyin bag 'khru bar 'gyur// zhes bya ba la/ de nas sngon po'i
181b5(gso rig): tshul gyi 'og tu gzhang 'bum gyi nad can la phal cher 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i tshul ni skems shing rdeg pa dang / mchog tu 'am shin tu bskyod par mi nus shing rtsol ba chung ba dang / nyams stobs zad cing nus bu chung ba dang / khong
181b6(gso rig): pab rmya zhing sgyid zhan pa dang / bzhin mdangs nyams shing bzhin ras kyi mdog mi sdug pa dang / lus lhod cing bya ba mi lcogs pa dang / snying po ltar sra zhing ma khrang ba'i bag med de/ de yang dper na 'bus zos pa'i shing ltar shin tu
182a1(gso rig): snying zhing snying po med pa yin no// de bzhin du bla gnyen gyi nang du ma gzhan ji skad pa rnams kyis kyang 'debs par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du sngar ji skad bshad pa'i gnad rnams gzir cing
182a2(gso rig): gnod par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du lud pa la sogs pas gnod cing nyen par 'gyur ba dang / lnga de bzhin du skad 'gags pa dang / skad gsangs zhum par 'gyur ba dang / sems khongs su chud cing yid la byed pas gnas pa dang /
182a3(gso rig): mchil ma mang du 'byung zhing bad kan gyi ldan ljin mang du 'dor ba dang / yi ga 'chus pa la sogs pa'i nod dang bcas par 'gyur pa dang / de bzhin du 'bru ma smin pa btsos pa'i khu ba lta bur sbyin bag tu 'dug cing 'byil
182a4(gso rig): pa gzhang kha nas 'dzag par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du bar skabs par skabs su lan 'ga' ni bshad pa sri zhing 'gag pa rtug snyam du 'gyur la/ lan 'ga' ni 'khru zhing sla bag tu 'byung por 'gyur la/ de bzhin du
182a5(gso rig): lan 'ga' ni sbyin par 'khru// lan 'ga' ni ma smin par 'khru ba nas sbyin bag gi bar du 'khru bar 'gyur ro// gzhang 'bum rlung shas tsho las gyur// skem zhing tseg tseg tsha ba dang // rid tsang dmar nag rengs pa dang /
182a6(gso rig): mi snyoms rtsub cing sra ba dang / phan tshun mi 'dra yo ba dang // rtse mo rno zhing gas pa dang // bam+ba rgya shugs khardzu ra// ras bal sa bon dang 'dra zhing // la la ka dam me tog 'dra// la la yungs kar lta bur skyes// mgo dang phrag
182b1(gso rig): pabartsib logs brla/ chu so dag tu lhag par na// sgyid pa sgregs pa bshang ba sri// snying 'phar yi ga 'chus pa bskyed// lung dbugs mi bde mi drod nyams// sman pa sgra bcas mgo 'khor byed// des nyen rtug skams nyung
182b2(gso rig): du ni/ sgra bcas bsgyu sme 'drin ma dang / na zhing spro ba 'byor bag can// rtug skams tshul gyis 'byung bar 'gyur// pags pa sen mo pra shang gaN+DI dang / mig dang gdong ni gnag pa dang // sman dang mi char pa rmya rdzi nges
182b3(gso rig): dang / gtun 'dra de nyid las 'byung 'gyur// zhes bya ba la/ gzhang 'brum gyi nad rlung gi shas che zhing rgyas pa la ni gzhang 'bum skam zhing khrag mi 'dzag cing skam pa dang / yungs kar gyi 'do gus bskus pa lte ri tsha
182b4(gso rig): ba'i bag tsog tsog por byed pa dang / snyib cing rtse mo yo ba dang / mdog dmar nag tu 'dug pa dang / phur pa ltar rengs shing 'greng ba dang / dbyibs mthon dman mi snyoms pa dang / sog le'i kha sna ltar rtsub pa dang / rdo
182b5(gso rig): la reg pa ltar sra ba dang / dbyibs phan tshun gcig la cig mi 'dra ba dang / yo zhing gzhu ltar gug pa dang / rtse mo tsher ma ltar rno ba dang / rtse mo gAs shing kha bye ba dang / bim+ba zhes bya ba 'bras bu dmar po zhig yod pa
182b6(gso rig): 'am/ rgya shugs phra mo'i 'bras bu 'am shing khardzu ra'i 'bras bu 'am ras bal gyi sa bon dang 'dra zhing mtshungs par skye ba dang / yang la la ni ka daM pa'i me tog dang 'dra bar skye la/ gzhang 'brum la la ni yungs kar gyi tshad
183a1(gso rig): tsam du phra ba skye bar 'gyur pa dang / yang de bzhin du mgo bo la sogs pa lhag par na zhing zug pa dang / sgyid pa la sogs pa mang ba dang / bshang ba sri ba la sogs pa nas/ rtug skam gyi tshul
183a2(gso rig): gyis bshang ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / pags pa la sogs pa gnag par 'gyur ba dang / yang rlung gi gzhang 'brum de nyid las skan la sogs pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no// mkhris shas che la rtse mo ni/ ston zhing
183a3(gso rig): dmar ser dkar bar snang // sla zhing dwi menam khrag sla 'dzag/ srab cing 'jam la lhod pa yin// mcher pa'i dum bu ni tsaM lce// srin bu pad+ma'i chu 'drar snang // tsha zheng brnag la rims dang rdul// skom dang yi ga 'chus rmo skyed//
183a4(gso rig): bshang blo sla zhing sngo li tsha// ser zhing dmar bar 'bru bar 'gyur// nad rul nad 'dra pags pa dang / sen sogs sngo se ra ldang bar 'gyur// zhes bya ba la/ mkhris pa shas che ba las gyur pa'i gzhang 'brum ni 'bru mo bu'i
183a5(gso rig): rtse mo sngon po dang / kha dog dmar ser dang dkar por snang ba dang / phra zhing chung ba la sogs pa dang / mcher ba'i dum bu la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i rnam pa 'dra bA tsha ba la sogs pa'i bla gnyen rked pa dang /
183a6(gso rig): bshang pa dro zhing sla ba la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i rnam par 'khru ba dang / nas rul ba'i nang gi dbyibs 'dra ba dang / pags pa dang sen mo dang mig dang bzhin dang dri ma rnams sngo zhing ser ba dang ldang bar 'gyur ro// /
183b1(gso rig): bad kan shas che rtswa ba sgrom// 'thug cing nad kyi shugs dal dkar// sbyangs shing rgyas la snum pa dang // 'gring zhing zlum la lci zhing brtan// 'byar bag cho ba chung zhing 'jam// g.yang zhing reg na 'gyu' bar byed// ka ri rA pA na sa
183b2(gso rig): yi// rus pa ba'i nu sor 'dra// chu sor zug cing sde gzhang na// lte ba lgang pa bcad snyam sems// lud pa dbugs mi bde snying na// mchil mong cham 'debs yi ge 'chus// gcin sgra mgo bo tshor ba mod// grang ba'i rims
183b3(gso rig): ni skyed par byed// khu chu 'dzag cing me drod nyams// smon zhing mA zhu'i nad kun skyed// bshang ba tshil 'dra bad kan mang // 'khru dang bcas par 'byung bar 'gyur// 'dzag par mi byed rdol mi byed// pags pa la sogs snum
183b4(gso rig): zhing dkar// zhes bya ba la/ gzhang 'brum bad kan shas tsha zhing bAdo ba l-i sno gyur pa'i ni rtsa ba sbom zhing che ba dang / 'thug cing lhun che ba dang / nad kyi shugs dul zhing mi drag pa dang / mdog dkar ba la sogs po'i rnam
183b5(gso rig): pa nas reg na dga' ba'i bar gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dang / shIng ka ri ra'i 'bras bu'i rus pa 'am/ ba na sa'i 'bras bu'i rus pa dang / dbyibs 'dri ba dang / de bzhin du ba'i nu sor gyi dbyibs 'dra ba yin la/ de bzhin du
183b6(gso rig): chu ser zug pa la sogs pa'i nad skyed pa dang / bshang ba tshil sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / brag la sogs pa 'dzag par mi byed cing / brdol ba 'am khe bye bar yang mi byed pa dang / pags pa dang mig dang sen
184a1(gso rig): mo la sogs pa snum zhing mdog dkar bar 'gyur ba yin no// 'dres pa las mtshan nyid 'dres ma yin// 'dus pa mtshan nyid kun dang ldan// zhes bya ba la/ gnyis pa 'dres pa las byung ba
184a2(gso rig): mtshan nyid ni gang dag las byung ba de dag 'dren mir snang ba yin la nad gsum 'dus pa lngas byung ba ni mtshan mA thams cad dang ldan pa yin no// khrag shas che las gzhang 'brum ni// mkhris pa'i mtshan nyid 'dra ba la//
184a3(gso rig): n+ya gro d+ha yi myu gu 'dra// b+hu ru 'ol mA so mdog 'dra// shin tu tsha dron pa dang // bshad pa'i shugs kyis rab bcir las// 'phral du khrag ni 'byung ba dang // de nyid shin tu 'dzag par 'gyur// sprul pa 'dra zhing khrag
184a4(gso rig): zad las// byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen 'gyur// mdog stobs spro ba nyams pa dang // medangs 'phrog dbang po nyams par 'gyur// zhes bya ba la/ khrag shas tsho zhing rgyas pa las gyur pa'i gzhang 'bum ni mkhris
184a5(gso rig): pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rnam pa dang 'dra bar 'byung ba dang / dbyibs ni shing n+ya gro d+ha'i myu gu dang 'dra zhing mdog b+hu ru 'am 'ol ma sner ltar dmar ba yin la/ yang gzhang 'bum de ni tshwa zhing dro ba dang / na ba dang bshang
184a6(gso rig): ba'i shugs kyis rab tu btsir ba las 'phral du khrag 'byung zhing khrag de nyid yang dang yang du shin tu 'dzeg par 'gyur ba dang / dbyibs sbal pa 'dra ba dang / khrag zad pa las byung zhing skyes pa'i sdug bsngal mnag
184b1(gso rig): par dkar ba dang / nyan cing gzer bar 'gyur ba dang / mdog la sogs pa nyams zhing bri bar gyur pa dang / mdangs phrogs shing nyams pa dang / dbang po nyam chung shing nus pa zhan par 'gyur ba yin no// mung+ga
184b2(gso rig): go dra ba'i phye ma// tsa na ka ri ra sogs pa// rtsub dang bshung pa sri bAs rlung // rapA gnas 'khrugs pas stobs ldan pas// thur du rgyu ba'i bu ga ni// bkag sti smad du rab skams nas// gshad pa gci ba phyen
184b3(gso rig): rnams ni// 'gags pas nad ni mi dazang bskyed// de yis khong pa rgyab rtsib lpags// snying garA nang ni shin tu bskyed// lto spos gsum pa na bo dang // snying bcu rgyu ma bcad snyim sems// nu sor shin tu zug pa dang // mkhur
184b4(gso rig): bskrang ba 'byung bar 'gyur// rlung ni gyen du song gyur na// de la slon rims yi ga 'chus// snying nad be'u snabs ma zhu dang // grwa tsi sr-i bshang ba 'khru ba dang // 'ani dang rab ri bi dbugs mi bdo// mgo nad lud pa chum pAs
184b5(gso rig): 'dobs// yid kyis 'gyur ba skom dang khrag/ ma khris pa sman dang dmu rdzings sogs// rlung gi nad gtogs de dang de// shin tu mi bzang 'byung bar 'gyur// gzhang 'bum gyen 'khyil gyur pa// nga ni mchog tu gnod byed yin//
184b6(gso rig): zhes bya ba la/ sran mung+ga dang / rtsa 'bru ko tra ba la sogs pa rtsub pa dang / bshang pa sri bar byed pa'i zas kyis thur du sel ba zhes bya ba'i rlung gi gnas 'khrugs shing ldang bar gyur pa stobs dang ldan zhing nus po che bas thur
185a1(gso rig): du rgyu zhing 'bab pa'i bu ga gang yin pa de bkag cing bcad nas/ ro smad du bshang ba de dag rab tu skams nas/ bshang pa dang gci ba dang phyen rnams 'gag shing phyir ma 'thon pa'i nad shin tu mi bzang
185a2(gso rig): cing brnag par dka' bar skyed par 'gyur la/ bshad pa la sogs pa 'gags pa des khong pa la sogs par nad shin tu gnod pa skyed la/ lto smos pa dang gsus pa gcus pa lta bur na ba dang / snying gcus pa snyam du sems
185a3(gso rig): shing mchil ma 'byung ba dang / rgyu mi'i nang gis bcad pa snyam du sems pa dang / chu so'i phyogs su zug cing na ba dang / mkhur ba gnyis skrang ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / rlung de rI stong du gyen du song bar gyur na/ rgyu dro las
185a4(gso rig): smon pa la sogs pa'i nad rlung las gyur pa'i nad grangs med pa'i mi bzad pa'i du ma dge 'byung bar 'gyur pa dang / gzhang 'brum gyi rgyus rlung gyen du 'khyil ba las gyur pa'i nad 'di ni mchog tu mi bzang par gnod cing
185a5(gso rig): sdug bsngal bar byed pa yin no// rlung shas che ba'i khyod par ni// de med par yang de 'byung 'gyur// zhes bya ba la/ khong pa rlung gi shes che zhing lto bar rlung nad rgyas par gyur pa'i srog chags rnams ni gzhang 'brum gyi
185a6(gso rig): rgyu de med par yang gyen du 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i rlung de'i nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lhan cig skyes dang nad gsum ldan// phugs ma'i gnyer mar gang gnas pa// de dag gsor mi rung ba yin/ me drod stobs che sogs kyis
185b1(gso rig): 'tsho/ zhes bya ba la/ gang gi lus la gzhang 'bum lhan cig skyes par gyur pa de ni gsor mi rung ba yin la/ phyis 'byung ba yin du zin kyang nang gzhi gsum char lus skyes pa dang / gnyer ma phugs mar gnas pa gang yin
185b2(gso rig): pa de dag kyang gsor mi rung ba yin la/ yang de ni me drod kyi stob sa che ba la sogs pas re zhig tshe ba tsam du gnas su rung ste/ sogs pa zhes smos pas lus kyi stobs dang / sman gyis sbyor ba dang / goms pa dang / sngon gyi
185b3(gso rig): las la sogs pa bsdu'o// 'dres las gyur dang gnyer me ni// bar mar gnas pa gang yin pa// lo gcig yan chad lon gyur pa// de dag gso dka' yin par bshad// ces bya ba la/ yong gzhang 'brum nad gzhi gnyis
185b4(gso rig): 'dres par gyur pa dang / de bzhin du gnyer ma rim pa gnyis par brten cing gnas pa dang / de bzhin du lo gcig yan chad lon zhing lo 'das par gyur pa de dag ni gso dka' ba yin par bshad do// phyi rol gnyer mar byung
185b5(gso rig): ba dang / nad cig shas tshe las byung dang // skyes nas ring por ma lon gang // gzhung 'brum du ni gso bar sla// zhes bya ba la/ yang gzhang 'brum gang phyi rol gyi gnyer ma'i rim par rten cing byung ba dang / de bzhin du nad gzhi
185b6(gso rig): gcig shas che zhing rgyas pa las byung ba dang / de bzhin du skyes nas yun ring por ma lon cing lo gcig man chad kyi nang du byung bar gyur pa'i gzhang 'brum de ni gso sla zhing bcos su rung ba yin no// pho mtshan sogs kyi
186a1(gso rig): 'og nas ni/ rang rang skabs bshad/ ces bya ba la/ pho mtshan dang / mo mtshan dang / rna ba dang sna gung la sogs par yang 'bum bu 'byung mod kyi/ de dag ni 'og nas sba ba'i nad kyi mtshan nyid
186a2(gso rig): shes par bya ba la sogs pa rang rang gi le'u las bshad do// lte bar skyes// rta b+hA ba yi kha 'du zhing / 'byung bag can+da la 'jam pa yin zhes bya ba la/ lte bar skyes pa'i 'brum bu ni srog chags rta zla ba byA bu zhes bya ba 'bru
186a3(gso rig): zhig yod po'i kha dang dbyibs 'dra zhing 'byung bag can la reg na 'jam po yin no// pags pa'i 'dzer po smras pa ni// khyab byed kyi ni bad kon bsdus// pagos pa'i phyi rol thor bur byed// 'dzer pa 'dra zhing rtsub par gan
186a4(gso rig): pags pa'i 'dzer pa yin par shes// zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te/ rlung khyab byed kyi bang kan gyi tshogs bsdus nos thor bu 'byung bar byed do/ de yang phyugs po'i phyi rol tu gnas par byed cing sha'i mdzad pa 'dra
186a5(gso rig): bar rtsub cing reg na ma bde bar gnas pa yin lo/ de ni 'dzer pa dang 'dra bas na// phyogs pa'i 'dzer ba yin par mngoni shes can gyi drang srong rnams kyis shes shing khong du chud pa yin no// rlung gyis zug cing rtsub par 'gyur//
186a6(gso rig): mkhris pa gnag la dmar rtsar 'dug/ bang kan gyis te snum nyid dang // rmen nu mdog dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ pags pa'i mdzer pa de rlung las gyur pa yin no/ zug cing na la reg pa rtsub par 'gyur ro// mkhan
186b1(gso rig): pa las gyur pa yin na ni mdog gnag la dmar bar 'gyur ro// bad kan las gyur pa yin na ni// pags pa'i 'dzer pa de snum pa nyid dang // rmen bu'i mdog dang 'dra zhing mtshungs pa yin no// blo dang ldan pas myur bar ni// 'ug
186b2(gso rig): de gzhang 'brum gso bar bya// de yis gzhung ni myur bkag nas/ dmu rdzing nang ni skye bar 'gyur// zhes bya ba la/ blo dang ldan zhing mkhas pa'i sman pa dang / myur zhing rings par 'bad pa dang ldan pas gzheng 'brum gyi nang gas
186b3(gso rig): bar bya'o// ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhang 'brum gyi nang nges gzhang gi sgo myur du 'gags por byas nas/ 'og nas bshad pa'i dmu rdzing gi nang gang yin pa des skyed cing 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin pas/ de'i phyir nang de ni shin tu sbyar
186b4(gso rig): ga kho nar gso bar bya'o// / yin log brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa/ tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/ skyob dpon zla ba la dgu bas rnam par sbyar ba las/ na gzhir
186b5(gso rig): gnas le'u bdun po'i rnam par 'grel pa'o// // de nas tshad par 'khru ba dang pho ba'i nang bzhi bshad par bya'o// zhes bya ba la/ gzhang 'bum gyi nang gzhi'i 'og tu 'di brtsam pa'i 'brel ba ni/ zos dang rlung dang shugs
186b6(gso rig): dgag pa la sogs pa rgyu thun mong yin pas bshad pa yin no// nad gzhi sna re kun dang ni// 'jig dang mya ngan los gyur pa'i// tshang par 'khru ba rnam drug yin// zhes bya ba la/ tshad par 'khrug pa'i nang ni rlung la sogs pa
187a1(gso rig): nad gzhi sna re las gyur pa dang / kun 'dus pa las gyur pa dang / de bzhin du 'jig pa las gyur pa dang / mya ngan las gyur pa ste/ tshang par 'khru ba ni rnam pa drug tu 'gyur ro// nga ni chu thungs
187a2(gso rig): drags pa drung / sha ring sha skams myu goms pa'i// til gyi khru ba ma smin 'bru// chung rtsub kha zas tshong ma zin// gzhang 'brum snum bag phyogs pa dang / 'bu dang shugs ni bkag las byung / zhes bya ba la/ yang chang par
187a3(gso rig): 'khru ba de ni chu thungs drags pA la sogs par las shin+na tu skyes shing 'byung bar 'gyuraro// ying de bzhin du sha ring dang / sha skams ril bag zos pa dang / de bzhin du sder za ma myong zhing ma zos par ti lo btags pa'i khu ba
187a4(gso rig): zos pa dang / de bzhin du ma smin pa'i 'bru las byas pa'i khaM zos zos pa dang / chang rtsub cing mang bar 'thungs pa dang / de bzhin du zas kyi tshong ma zin pa gsung bag tu zos pa dang / gzhang 'brum gyis btab pa dang // snum
187a5(gso rig): bag mang du zos shing drags pa dang / lto na srin bu yod pa dang / bshad pa la sogs pa'i shugs bkag pa las kyang tshang par 'khru bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de 'drar rlung ni 'khrugs pa yis// chu khams thur du ba skyong

187b1(gso rig): ldang bar gyur nas/ chu'i khams lus las gang yod pa thur du bskyod cing 'byung bar byed 'gyur la/ de'i 'og tu de'i khams de nyid kyis pho ba'i me drod shin tu nyam chung bar byas nas/ de nas de'i 'og tu chu'i khams de nyid kyi

187b4(gso rig): phyogs dang snying ga dang lto ba'i phyogs su zug cing na ba dang / lus dang yan lag snyoms zhing lci ba dang / bshang ba bsri ba la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de rlung 'gyur ba shang chur bcas// nyung zhig 'byung zhing
187b5(gso rig): gzer sgra bcas// gag cing 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang // rtsub sla sbu bar bcas pa 'am// gong bur yang dang yang du 'byung // de bzhin bu ram tshig pa 'dra// sbyin bag bcas shing cang snyam sems// kha ske ma gzhang
187b6(gso rig): ni snang ba dang // sku langs pa dang 'khru ba yin/ zhes bya ba la/ chad par 'khru ba de dag gi nang nas rlung las gyur pa'i 'khru ba ni bshang ba dang chur bcas te/ tshu rul pa lta bur 'byung ba dang / mkhregs shing nyung zhig
188a1(gso rig): 'byung ba dang / sgyu dang bcas shing gzer ba dang // bcas par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang // 'gag cing bsku bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / mdog rngub pa dang / smra zhing rgyang chung por 'byung ba dang /

188a5(gso rig): kan las gyur bska ba dang 'byur brag dkar zhing nal nal po// snu mo zhing be'u snabs bang kan bcas// rgyun du 'khru zhing lci la mnam// bska zhing nang rjes 'brang ba dang / gnyid che khong snyoms yi ga 'chus// nyung zad nyung
188a6(gso rig): zad 'khru dang bcas// ba spu brtse zhing glong bcas dang // chu so lto ba gzhang kha lci// bshangs kyang bshang ba ma btang snyam// zhes bya ba la/ bang kan las gyur pa'i tsheng pa ra khru ba ni 'khru ba bsku zhing gar por 'thung bar
188b1(gso rig): 'gyur ba dang / 'byung bag la sogs pa dang bcas par 'byung ba dang / khong snyoms pa dang bya ba rnams spro ba chung ba'o// glongs pa ni nad rnams spyod par gyur pa'o// lci ba ni chu so dang lto ba dang gzhang kha kun tu lci zhing

188b6(gso rig): chur mi 'bying pa dang / mtshan ma rlung dang mkhris pa las byung ba dang 'dra ba yin par slob dpon rnams kyis bshang ngo // mya ngan las byung ba'i tshong par 'khru ba'i mtshan nyid kyang rlung gi dang mkhris pa las byung po'i tshul
189a1(gso rig): de dang mtshungs shing 'dra ba yin par bshang ngo // mdor na tshang 'khru rnams gnyis te// ma zhur bcas dang ma zhur med// khrag bcas khrag med ces bya ba la/ tshad par 'khru ba ni mdor bsdu na rnam

189b1(gso rig): sbyang bar bya ba la 'bad pa med par gyur na/ de grung pa la sogs pa'i pho ba'i nang du 'gyur ro// me drod nyams par byed pa yi// zas brten pa yis me drod nyams// zhes bya ba la pho ba'i nang de yang khrong pa'i madrong nyams par byed

189b3(gso rig): nimibe'u snabs bcas dang be'u snabs med// 'khru ba de ni tshang 'khru ste// rang bzhin gyis ni myur gsod byed/ ces bya ba la/ nad kyis khyang por gang dag gis zas zhu bar gyur nas bshang ba be'u snabs dang bcas pa

190a1(gso rig): 'ga' ni rgyu med par bshangad pa de sla bar yang dang yang du 'byung zhing 'khru bar 'gyur ro// yang pho ba'i ma zhu ba de ni yun ring du sogs shing bshang ba'i 'khru ba dang / yun ring por na bar byed cing
190a2(gso rig): myur du gsod par mi byed pa yin// de ni nang sna re re 'dus// las byung rnam pa bzhi yin no// zhes bya ba la/ pho ba mu zhu ba'i nang de ni rnam pa bzhi yod de rlung la sogs pa nad gzhi re re las skyes pa dang 'dus pa
190a3(gso rig): deng las 'byung ba yin no// de yi ston tshul snyim pa dang // ring nus 'ju zhing skyur bag 'byung // mchil mang khwa yi dri mi tshor// snyom bag skom zhing yi ga 'chus// lto spros smon zhi bro ba dang // rna ba rgyu ma sgra
190a4(gso rig): dang bcas// zhes bya ba la/ pho ba'i mi zhu ba grang ba'i nang de'i phyis 'byung ba'i rtags sngon du 'byung ba'i tshul ni yan lag/ snyom zhing nyam chung ba dang pho ba'i mi drong zhan cing zas ring nas 'ju ba dang / de bzhin du

190b1(gso rig): 'byung dang / rtsi ba logs brla dang chu sor na/ bshang ba yang dang yang du 'byung // yang dang spo zhing gsung pa dang // ro rnams kun la skam pa dang // bkres skom rgyu ba bcang snyam sems// zas zhu nas ni spo ba dang / zas zos

190b4(gso rig): ba na bar 'gyur ba dang / mngar ba la sogs pa'i ro rnams kun la bskam zhing chags pa dang / rgyu ma bcad pa bzhin du sems shing na ba dang / zas zhu nas lto spo bar 'gyur ba dang / de ltar na na ba kha zas zos
190b5(gso rig): shing longs spyad na sla bar 'gyur ba dang / rlung las gyur pa'i snying nad la sogs pa 'byung bar ngogs shing yid gnyis su 'gyur ba dang / yun ring zhig na bshang ba 'byung zhing thogs la na bar 'gyur pa dang / bska ba

191a1(gso rig): bya ba lA/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'i pho ba'i nang ni 'khru ba sngo zhing ser ba 'dren mar 'byung ba 'am/ ser por 'byung ba la sogs pa yin no// bad kAn las gyur 'ju dka' zhing // zas slon

192a1(gso rig): 'gag pa ni gcin sri ba la sogs bya ste/ de'i nang bani bshad par bya'o// zhes pa'o// lgang pa lhung ba'i mgo bo mtshan/ rmed pa rlig pa gzhang kha ni// gzhang khA'i rus par rten gyur
192a2(gso rig): cing gcig tu 'brel pa yin par bshad/ ces bya ba lA/ lhung ba la sogs pa lus kyis char gtogs pa rnams ni 'brel pa gcig cing mdor bsdus pa gcig yin par bshad la/ de dag gi gnas sam rten ni
192a3(gso rig): gzhang gi nang naste gnas te/ de dang 'brel lo zhes bya ba'i don no// ltung pa kha ni thur bltas kyang // gaN+Din 'jig pa yi rtsa sgo nas// rgyun mi 'chad pa'i 'dzag pa yis// ngos gnyis nas ni 'phre'us 'gengs// zhugs
192a4(gso rig): pa gang yin de yis ni// gcin 'gag pa dang gtson snyi ba'i// gas dka' nad la brten pa'i gnang// nyi sha skyed par byed pa yin// zhes bya ba la/ gang gi phyir lhung ba de ni kha thur du bltas te gnas pa yin du zin kyang
192a5(gso rig): gcin 'dzag cing rgyu bar byed pa'i rtsa'i sbubs phra mo phra mo las rgyun mi 'chad par 'dzag cing 'bab par byed par rtsi'i ngos gnyis na gnas pa de las gcan gyi phre'u 'dzag pas lgang pa 'gengs par byed la/ gang las

192b1(gso rig): so pho mtshan na/ cung zad yang dang yang du 'byung // sri ba rlung las gyur pa yin// zhes bya ba la/ rlung las gyur pa'i gcin sri ba'i mtshan nyid ni/ skyes bu lgang pa dang chu so'i phyogs pho mtshan lhag par na zhing //

192b5(gso rig): zhes bya ba la/ nad gzhi gsum char 'dus pa'i gcin sri ba ni nad kyis mtshan nyid gsum char dang ldan pa yin no// gang tshe rlung gis lgang pa'i kha/ bkag pa de tshe gcin mkhris pa// bang kan khu chur bcas pa nAM
192b6(gso rig): rims kyis skams par byas pa las// mi bzang rte'u chags 'gyur te/ ba lang mkhris par 'gi'u waM ltar thams cad bad kan la brten 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ gang gi tshe rlung gis nad 'khrugs par gyur nas/ lgang pa'i
193a1(gso rig): kha bkag nas gnas pa de'i tshe gcin mkhris pa dang bcas pa 'am/ bad kan dang bcas pa 'am/ khu chu dang bcas pa'i rim gyis skams par byed kyi/ gAcin 'ba' zhig skams
193a2(gso rig): pa ni mi byeng la/ de'i tshe ni rde'u chags par 'gyur te/ de yang mi bzad paR+Sha na zhing gso dka' zhing thogs pa 'gyuraro// de yang dper na ba lang gi ma khris pa skams zhing mthas pa'i rims kyis 'gi wang skye ba dang
193a3(gso rig): 'dra bar rde'u chags par 'gyur ro// de yang thams cad bang kan la brten cing gnas par 'gyur ro// 'di yis sngon tshul mtshan nyid ni// lgang pa spo zhing nge yi ni// nyen kor kun tu rab tu na// gcin yang lhag par
193a4(gso rig): dbri bro zhes// gcin 'gag rims 'debs yi ge 'chus// zhes bya ba la/ de nas rde'u chags pa 'di'i sngon byung ba'i mtshan nyid dam rtags ni lgang pa spro zhing rgyas pa dang / de bzhin du de'i nyen kor lhung ba'i
193a5(gso rig): mgo dang / pho mtshan dang rlig pa la sogs pa kun tu thog tha ga rab tu na zhing zug pa dang / gcin dbye ba la sogs par 'gyur ro// spyi yi mtshan nyid lte ba dang / lgang mgo lgang pa'i srubs na zhing / de yis
193a6(gso rig): gcin 'byung sgo bkag pas// gcin gyis rgyu ni 'chad cing 'byung // de byung zin nas bde bar byed// sla zhing ba lang tshal 'dra la/ de skyong pa yos khrag tu 'gyur// drag shul spyod pas rab tu na// zhes bya ba la//
193b1(gso rig): spyi'i mtshan nyid dam thun mong gri rtags ni lte ba la sogs par na zhing zug pa dang / rde'u chags pa des gcin 'byung ba'i rgyun srang gi sgo bkag pas/ gcin gyis rgyun chad cing sul sul 'byung ba dang / de phyung zin cing de
193b2(gso rig): dang bral nas bde byed pa yin pa'am/ yang na rde'us bkag pa de bzhin du 'gyur na bde bar 'byung ba yin no// gcin 'byung ba de yang dang zhing sla lnga pa lang gi tshil 'dra bar 'byung // yang bskyod cing rtswa la sogs pa'i/
193b3(gso rig): gzhon pas g.yengs par gyur na/ khrag tu 'byung bar 'gyur la/ drag shul gyi spyod lam tshar bcang nge brgyug pa 'am/ sbyang ba byas pas rab tu na zhing mi bde bar 'gyur ro// de la rlung gyur shin tu na// so 'thams sdom
193b4(gso rig): sdom zhing lus 'dar la// pho mtshan nyed cing lte ba 'chir// rgyun tu na zhing 'khun pa ru byed// bshang pa phyen dang bcas par 'byung // gcin gyi thigs pa yang yang 'ong // rnga'u gnag cang rtsub pa dang / chu sor tshor med
193b5(gso rig): geng snyam byed// ces bya ba la/ rde'u chags de rnams kyi nang nas rlung las gyur pa'i rdo'u chags par gyur pa ni/ shin tu na bas gzir cing de nyid kyi na so 'bams par sdom zhing krig krig 'cha' bar 'gyur ba dang /
193b6(gso rig): lus 'dir zhing bskyod pa dang / pho mtshan nyed par byed pa dang / lte ba'i phyogs lag pa gnyis kyis 'char bar byang pa dang nyi mtshan rgyun du 'khun zhing nga ro 'byin pa dang / bshang ba phyen dang bcas par 'byung ba
194a1(gso rig): lnga sogs pa yin no// mkhris pa lgang pa tsha ba dang / bcos pa snyam byed rab tu dro// go bya'i 'bras bu dbyibs 'dra la// rde'u mdog dmar zhing ser lnga gnag/ ces bya ba la/ mkhris pa
194a2(gso rig): las gyur pa'i rde'u chags pas ni lgang pa shin tu nu zhing btsos pa snyam du byung la/ de bzhin du rab tu dro zhing tsha ba dang ljon par 'gyur ro// rde'u'i dbyibs kyang se shing 'bras bu'i dbyibs dang 'dra ba la/ rde'u'i kha
194a3(gso rig): dog kyi nga dmar ser du 'dug cing rtsa gnag pa yin no// bad kan gyis bsol lci ba dang // lgang ba'i nang du zug cing na// rde'u che zhing 'jam pa la// sbrang rtsi'i mdog gam yang na pa/ 'o// zhes bya ba la/ bad kan lngas
194a4(gso rig): gyur pa'i rde'u chags pa nI rag na bsil ba dang rang bzhin lci ba dang / lgang pa'i nang lag gis btsugs pa ltar na ba la sogs pa yin no// 'di dag byis pa rnams la ni// phal cher 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin//
194a5(gso rig): gnas dang shwa ni chung ba'i phyir/ gzung dang dbyung ba bde pa yin/ zhes bya ba la/ rde'u chags pa gsum po 'di dag ni phal cher ram/ mang du byis pa rnams la 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no// de yang byas pa rnams
194a6(gso rig): la 'byung ba ni rde'u bzung ba dang byung bar bde ba yin no// ci'i phyir zhe na/ gnas dang sha chung ba'i phyir te/ lgang pa chung ba nyid kyi phyir dang / sha chung zhing srab pa'i phyir gzung ba dang / dbyung pa gnyis ga bde ba yin no// mi
194b1(gso rig): tshan khu ba las byung rje'u// khu ba bkag las 'byung bar 'gyur/ gnas las 'phos pa phyir ma byung // rlig par gnas pa rlung gis ni// skams nas nye bar bsdus pa gyur pa// de ni khu ba rde'u chags yin// lgang
194b2(gso rig): pas gcin ni sri byed cing // tsha zhing skrangs par byed pa yin/ zhes bya ba la/ mi chen po lta bu los byung ba'i rde'u 'byung bar 'gyur la/ de yang khu ba bkag pa'i bzhi las byung la/ de yang khu ba gnas las 'phos par
194b3(gso rig): gyur cing / nyal po spyod pa'i bar chad du gyur pas/ phyi ma lam log par song ba de rlig pa/ drag gi ber na gnas pas na/ rlung gis bsdus te khu ba de skams nas gong por byas pa dra ni khu ba'i rdo'u chags pa zhes byas la
194b4(gso rig): de yang lgang pa gci ni sri ba la sogs par byed cing rlig par sbyangs par byed pa yin no// de ni skyes ma thag tu ni/ khu ba zhu ste sla bar 'gyur// zhes bya ba la/ rde'u skyes mo thag ring po ma lon par khu ba zhu zhing slu brag
194b5(gso rig): tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyogs der mnan+da na zhu bar byed/ ces bya bA l-i/ rde'u de phyogs gang du chags pa'i phyogs der mnan pa tsam gyis zhu zhing 'byung bar 'gyuraro// rde'u gseg ma lta bur gnas// rlung gis
194b6(gso rig): phyi mar bshig gyur pa// ngo 'dir tshul bzhin 'byung zhes bya// gcin dang lhan cig phyir 'byung 'gyur// lcogs bzhin mo 'byung rde'u chags// zhes bya ba la/ khu ba rde'u chags pa rlung gis phye mar bshig pa
195a1(gso rig): ni gseg ma lta bu zhes bya ste/ gseg mA phye mu lta bur det+tang tshul bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur bas ni gcin+da dang lhan cig phyir 'byung bar 'gyur la/ rlung lugs bzhin mi 'byung
195a2(gso rig): ste/ 'khyil na ni rde'u chags par byed kyi gcin dang lhan cig phyir 'byung bar mi byed do// gcin nr-i bkag pa byas gyur pas// rlung gis lgang pa'i kha bkag nas/ gcin 'gags na zhing g.ya' bar 'gyur// zhes bya
195a3(gso rig): ba la/ skyes bus gcin 'byung ba non gyis bkag par gyur pas de'i skyon gyis rlung gis lgang pa'i sgo bkag nas gcin 'gags shing g.ya' ba'i nang skyes par 'gyur ro// lan 'ga' rang gnas la sbags nas/
195a4(gso rig): lgang ba rgyusau te kha tshwa zhing / mAngal 'dra sgom zhing log par 'dug/ de ni no zhing tsha bar byed// 'phar zhing gcus pa snyam du sems// thigs pa tsam du 'dzag pa dang // lhung btsir rgyun ni 'byung bar 'gyur// rnam pa
195a5(gso rig): gnyis po 'di dang ni// rlung gi lgang ba'i nad ces bya// gso dka' gnyis pa rlung gis yin// mthu tshe shin tu gso dka' yin// zhes bya ba la/ yang rlung lan 'ga' ste/ tshe 'di'am/ tshe ribs gzhan gyi
195a6(gso rig): rgyun dbang gis rang 'dug pa'i gnas las spa gso shing bskyod do// lgang pa de rgyas par byas nas/ kha'i zheng che ba nang mngal 'dra ba dang / sbom zhing log par 'dug pa rang gi tshad las che la gnas las 'phos
195b1(gso rig): two log par 'dug par gyur na lgad pa der nu ba la sogs par 'gyur la gcin thugs pa tsam du nyung zhig 'dzag par 'gyur la/ lhung pa gcir na rgyun tu 'bab cing 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ltar rnam pa gnyis pa de dag
195b2(gso rig): nA rlung las gyur pa'i lgang pa'i nad ces bya'o// de ni gso dka' ba yin la/ de gnyis las kyang gnyis pa ni rlung shas che ba'i phyir shin tu yang gliso dga' ba yin no// bshang lam dang ni lgang pra yi// bar na rlung
195b3(gso rig): ni brten gyur pa// btun 'dra sra zhing mtho ba dang // mi 'gyur gnas byed mdud pa can// rlung nang btun 'dra de spyos bcas// ba shrAng ci phyen ni 'gag byed yin// zhes bya ba la/ bshad ba'i lam ni gzhung dang
195b4(gso rig): lhung pa'i bar na rlung brtan cing gnas par 'gyur ba de ni btun 'dra zhing d+mor rnam pa can yin la/ gzhan yang mtho zhing 'jug pa la mi 'gyur bar gnas po'i mdud can lto bu de ni lho spros pa dang bcas pa'i nad
195b5(gso rig): skyed par 'gyur ro// log rgyu 'khyil bar byed pa yi// rlung gis chu sor mi bzang gzer// gcin la zhugs te 'khyil byed cing // rengs byed lci zhing bcus snyam byed// gcin ni nyung shas nyung shas 'byung //
195b6(gso rig): yang na ba shing gci gtong tshe 'byung // 'di ni rlung nang 'khyil pa yin zhes bya ba la/ rlung thur du rgyu ba'i lam 'gagau te'o khyil nas zlum par gnas pa de chu sor brten par gyur na/ mi bzad pa'i gzar bskyed de
196a1(gso rig): gcinA la zhugs nas gcin de 'khyil zhing sgri bar byed pa la sogs pa'i tshul byed pa'am/ yang na gcan nyung shas nyung shas 'dzag par 'gyur ro// de lta bu'i rlung las gyur pa'i gcan
196a2(gso rig): nad de ni 'khyil zhes bya ba yin no// gcin ni yun ring 'gag gyur po// sri zhing 'byung bar mi 'gyur la/ gtson thon nas ni nang tshabs 'bri// zhes bya ba la/ yang gcin yun ring zhig bkug cing brnags par
196a3(gso rig): gyur pa ni phyis gtong ba'i tshe sri zhing bde blag tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur la/ de ni gcin thon nas nad tshabs 'bri ba'i gcin nad ces bya'o// gcin bkag pa yis gnod gyur pa// gang tshe rlung gis bzlog gyur pa//
196a4(gso rig): lci ba'i 'og nas lte ba'i bar// gcin gyis grang gyur de'i tshe// rab tu na zhing spro dang // zas myi zhu zhing me drod 'gags// de ni lto gcin 'gags shes bya// zhes bya ba la/ gcin bkag cing mnags pa'i skyon
196a5(gso rig): gyis nang du gyur pa de ni dus gang gi tshe rlung gis gyen du bzlog par gyur pa'i tshe lte ba'i 'og nas lte ba'i byar du nA ba la sogs pa'i nad skyed par 'gyur te/ de ni lto bar gcin 'gags pa zhes bya'o//
196a6(gso rig): gcin 'byung buM ga 'chus pa 'am/ rlung gos 'gags nas gcin gung 'byung // lgang pa mtshan sbubs nor bur ni// gnas nas de 'og romo kyi 'dzag/ nang bcas pa'am nad med pa// gcin ni tshang dang ba
196b1(gso rig): par 'byung // lhag ma lus te mtshan lci yin// zhes bya ba la/ gcin 'byung ba'i bu ga 'chus pa la sogs pa'i skyon nam/ yang na rlung gis 'gags pas gcin nyung ngu 'byung zhing / skye bar 'gyur pa dang /
196b2(gso rig): de yang lgang pa'am mtshan gyis sbubs sam/ pho mtshon gyi rtse mo nor bu zhes bya ba la gnas nas rims gyis 'dzag par 'gyur zhing / de nad dang bcas pa'am nad med par gcin chad cing sri bag dang bcas
196b3(gso rig): pas 'byung la/ 'byung ba'i lhag ma lus pas de mtshan lci bar 'gyur ba yin to/ pho mtshan khong lci ba'o// lgang pa'i kha nad zlum zhing sra// cung zhig 'phral du 'byung 'gyur na/ gcin sogs rde'u lta bur na/ gcin gyi
196b4(gso rig): mdud par de bshad do// zhes bya ba la/ lgang pa'i kha'i nang zlum por gnas la/ sra bar gyur cing cung zhig 'phral du 'byung la/ de lta bu'o nad de ni rje'us 'gags pa lta bur na la/ mtshan ma de lta bur na ba la ni gcin gyi
196b5(gso rig): mdud pa zhes bya'o// gcin snyoms pa las nyal po byas la/ rlung gis khu ba skyong gyur pa// gnas las bskyod cing gcin gtong tshe/ sngon nam phyi nas thal chu dang / mdog 'dra 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin/ khu ba 'dres
196b6(gso rig): par de bshad do// zhes bya ba la/ gcin sgom zhing 'obyung bar 'dod pa dang / skyes pas bud med la nyal po byas na/ rlung gis khu ba bskyod cing g.yos par gyur pas gnas las bskyod cing 'phos par gyur pa de
197a1(gso rig): gcin gtong ba'i gcin gyi sngon du'am gcin gyis phyi nas thal chu dang mdog 'dra bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba de ni khu ba dang gcin 'dres pa zhes bya'o// rtsub cing snyems la rlung gis ni// gang tshe rtug
197a2(gso rig): skams nad gyur pa// gcin 'thung bu gar song nas ni// bshang pa dang 'dres de'i tshe// gcin ni bshang ba'i dri can 'byung // bshang ba 'gags par de bshang do// zhes bya ba la/ skyes bu khong rtsub ces skams por gyur pa
197a3(gso rig): dag rlung gi nad kyis gang gi tshe rtug skams kyi nang du 'gyur zhing / gyen du bsgyur bar gyur pa na/ de'i tshe gcin 'byung ba'i bu gar song zhing kun tu khyab pa dang / bshang ba dang gcin 'dris par gyur la des na gcin de bshang
197a4(gso rig): ba'i dri ma can du 'gyur zhing 'byung la/ de lta bu'i gcin sri ba de ni bshang ba 'ag ga pa'i gcin sri bar zhes bya bar bshad do// mkhris pa drag shul kha zas ni// rno ba nyi tshan lam sogs kyis// 'phel zhing rlung ni zhugs gyur
197a5(gso rig): pab/ lgang po'i nyen kor tsha zhing na// gcin ni ser bar 'byung gyur pa'am// yang na khrag bcas khrog nyid 'byung // tshwa zhing s+thi lA yang yang 'byung // de nI tsha rlung zhes byar bshad ces bya ba la/ mkhris pa'i che zhing rtsol ba drag pa
197a6(gso rig): la sogs pas rlung zhugs pas bskyod pas gyur pa la ni lgang pa'i nyen kor cha ba la sogs pa'i nang 'byung ste/ de ni gci sri ba'i cha rlung zhes bya ba yin no// rngu bo cing lus ni rgya bo yin// lgang par gnas pa'i mkhris pa
197b1(gso rig): rlu/ gcin drud chung dun par bcas// skyed pa da yang ngaskud bshad// bad kan mkhris pa gnyi ga la/ rlung gis bskyod par gyur na ni// da cho gcin sri sar ba dang / dmar zhing dkar la bska ba 'byung // de ni cha bcas /
197b2(gso rig): tshaM dAm// dung gi phye ma'i mdog 'dra'am// yang na sbrum zhing mdog kun ldan// de ni gcin nyams nang du bshad/ ces bya ba la/ skyes bu khong rtsub cing lus rgyu zhing nyam chung bar gyur pa la/ gang gi tshe lgang bar gnas pa'i
197b3(gso rig): mkhris pa dang / rlung gnyis ni gcin zad pa la sogs pa skyed par byed do// de yang mkhris pa dang rlung las gyur pa'i gcin sri ba'i nad ces bya bar de skad du bshad do// yang gang gi tshe mkhris pa dang bad kan gnyis la
197b4(gso rig): yang rlung gis bskyod cing g.yos par gyur pa de'i tshe/ gcin shes tshor sri zhing kha dog ser po la sogs pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// de yong tsha ba dang bcas shing gi waM la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i mdog gam/
197b5(gso rig): yang na skems zhing mdog thams cad dang ldan par 'byung ste/ de ni gaN+DIn nyams pa'i nad ces bya'o// drang srong rnams kyis bshad do// de ltar gcin 'grags las 'byung ba'i// mtshan nyid rgya cher bshad nas ni//
197b6(gso rig): de 'og gcin snyi las byung ba'i// nang gzhi'i mtshan nyid bshad pa yin zhes bya ba la/ de ltar ji skad du bshad pa'i tshul gyis sngar rnam par dpyad pa'i tshul gyis/ gcin 'gags shing sri ba las byung ba'i
198a1(gso rig): nad kyi mtshan nyid rgya cher bshad cing bstan nas/ de'i 'og tu gcin sti zhing 'dzag pa las byung ba'i nad gzhi'i mtshan nyid drang srong rnams kyis bshad pa yin no//
198a2(gso rig): yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa/ tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/ slob dpon+da zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las/ nang gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u dgu pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//
198a3(gso rig): de nas gcin snyi ba za khu'i nang dmigs bshad par bya'o// zhes bya ba la/ 'di brtsams pa'i 'brel pa ni/ de 'og gcin snyi ba las byung ba'i nad gzhi'i mtshan nyid bshad pa yin zhes gzhung rtsom pa nyid kyis bshad

198a5(gso rig): byA ba la/ de la gtson sde ba'i nang nyi shu las// gaucin nang zo khu bcu ni pang kan las gyur pa yin te/ chu 'dra ba dang / pu ram shing gi khu b+h+rUM 'dra ba dang / gar po dang chang 'dra ba dang / 'bras bai tagis pa'i chu 'dra ba
198a6(gso rig): dong / khu chu 'dra ba dang / bye ma lta bu dang / bsil mo dang / bags kyi 'thung ba dang / kha chu lhar 'byung ba'i za khu zhes bya'o// mkhris pa las gyur pa'i ni drug ste/ nas tshigs 'khrus pa'i thal chu 'dra ba dang / sngon po dang
198b1(gso rig): nag po dang / skyer ba 'dra ba dang tsong khu 'dra ba dang / khrag 'dra ba ste rnam pa drug yin no// rlung las gyur pa ni bAzhi ste/ zhag dang rkang glang tshe'i za khu dang / sbrang rtsi lta bu gcin snyi ba'i nad do// de rnams tshol gcin pad+ma
198b2(gso rig): kan+da skyed// za so dang skom gyi tshul las ni// phal cher de dag 'byung bar byed// mdor dang skyur dang lan tshwa dang // lci zhing 'khyil bA bsil ba dang / 'bru mar chang dang gsher po'i sha/ dar ba pu ram bu ram shing // gnas gcig

198b4(gso rig): zhing / phal cher te mang du de dag 'byung zhing / gcin skye ba'i nang skyed par byed pa'i rgyu yin la/ gzhan yang mngar ba nas bu ram shing gi bar gyi dngos po ming gis smos pa'i zas dang skom yang de 'byung bar byed pa yin
198b5(gso rig): la/ spyod lam gyi rnam pa gnas gcig dang stan gcig la rtag tu gnas pa la sogs pa'i bya ba de skyed par gtogs pa dang / mal sman cho ga dang mi ldan pa ste stan rlan can dang grang ba la sogs pa'i lamau na gnas
198b6(gso rig): pa las gcin nang skyed par byed par 'gyur ro// bang kan 'khrugs pas lgang par gcin// s+t+waM 'gyur lus gosher rdul tshol dang // sha blongs lgang par rten gcin ste// mkhris pa khrag kyang zad byas nas/ bad kan sogs
199a1(gso rig): zad gcin nang skyed// ces bya ba la/ bad kan 'khrugs par gyur pa las lus kyi gsher bag pang rdul la sogs pa slongs shing gnod par byas la/ thag kyang zad par byas nas bde
199a2(gso rig): kan las gyur pa yang zad par byas nas/ gcin lo gnas po'i mkhris pas gcin nad za khu skyed par byed do// rlung 'khrugs pa dang de zad las// lus zungs lgang par 'khus te skyed// ces bya ba la/ lus
199a3(gso rig): zungs rnams dang rlung 'khrugs shing ldang ba dang / mkhris pa la sogs pa zad pas dngas ma la sogs po'i lus zungs lus kyi bcud gyur pa lgang par 'khru zhing 'dus par byas nas gcin snyi ba'i nang skyed par byed/
199a4(gso rig): de byung gso bya 'tsho tsam dang / spang bya gats+tshin na du rnam gsum 'gyur// mdor na mi mthun bya ba dang / nad dmigs chen po nyid kyis 'byung / zhes bya ba la/ bad kan dang mkhri sr-i pa dang / rlung de dag las byung ba'i gcin
199a5(gso rig): spyi ba'i nad ni gso bar bya ba dang / re zhig 'tsho ba tsam du gnas pa dang / sbrang pad+ma byi bo ste/ rnam pa gsum du 'gyur lta/ de yang mdog ni mi mthun par bya ba ste/ gang gi phyir snum pa la sogs pa rlung nad la phan
199a6(gso rig): ba de ni bad kan la gnod la/ gang kha ba dang bska ba la sogs bad kan la phan do ni rlung la gnod do// de bzhin du mkhris pa la phan pa bsil ba dang / mngar ba dag ni rlung dang bid kan la gnod de/ gzhan yang
199b1(gso rig): nang dmigs chen po'i dpyad kyis kyang 'byung ste/ mI mthun pa'i gso lus zungs zad cing skyem pa'i lus 'jig par byed pa'i nad dmigs chen po'i tshul gyis 'byung ngo // de rnams kyis ni spyi'i mtshan nyid// gtson
199b2(gso rig): ni rnyog ma can du 'byung // de las khyad par nyid dang ni// gcan gyi mdog sogs dbye ba yis// gcin snyi'i dbye ba brtag par bya// zhes bya ba la/ gcin nang thams cad kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid dang / rtags ni gcin stsogs
199b3(gso rig): ngam can dul dul po mang du 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no// gnod dang gnod bya khyang mid kyang // gcin snyi'i dbye ba du mar 'gyur pa de ni 'dus shing phrad pa'i khyad par nyid de/ gnod pa dang gnod par bya ba'i 'phel 'bri'i
199b4(gso rig): khyad par nyid dang / gcin gyis mdog dang ro dang dri dang reg bya'i khyad par lo so gcin+da sti bya'i dbye ba brtag par bya zhing yongs su shes par bya'o// dang zhing meng la dkar zhing bsil// dri nga medo cing chu 'dra la// gcin
199b5(gso rig): smyo chu yi zla khru yin// zhes bya ba la/ gtson skye ba'i nang tshu'i za khro zhes bya ba ni dang zhing rnyog mo med pa la stsogaso ba'i khyad bar dang ldan po'i chu'i rnam pa dang 'dra ba'i gcin 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no// cung zad
199b6(gso rig): rnyog ce na sbyin bag dang / bu rom shing khu lta bur mngar// za khu bu ram shing khu yin// zhes bya ba la/ gcin nad za khu bu ram shing lte bu ram ni cung zad rnyog pa yod pa la sogs pa la bu ram shing gi khu bo ltar
200a1(gso rig): shin tu mngar ba'i gtsun 'byung ba yin no// zhag lon na ni bsku bar 'gyur// za khu gar ba zhes bya'o// zhes bya ba la/ gcan nang pa khu gar po ni gcin mtshan mo 'das kyi bar du ma gcis par
200a2(gso rig): bzhag pa ste bsku ba'i gar por 'byung ba yin no// steng na dang sa mu 'og na bsku// chang 'dra chang gi za khu yin// zhes bya ba la/ gcin nod chang gi za pu zhes bya ba lnga phyir byung ba na steng gi phyogs dang sa mar gnas shing /
200a3(gso rig): 'og bslu bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de lta bu'i gcin 'byung ba la bya'o// ba spu ldang zhing 'bras btags 'dra// dkar zhing maung 'byung 'bras phye 'dra// zhes bya ba lo/ gcini nad za khu 'bras phye 'dra ba ni/ gcin 'byung ba na ba
200a4(gso rig): spu ljang zhing bsher la/ gcin nyid 'bras btags pa 'dra ba rau dkar po 'byung zhing mang du 'byung ba yin no// khu chu 'dra ba 'am khu bo 'dris// khu bau 'dra ba'i za khu yin// zhes bya bo la/ gcin nAd za khru khu chu 'dra
200a5(gso rig): pa ni gcin khu ba dang bcas par 'byung ba 'am/ khu ba dang 'dra bar gcis pa la bya'o// gcin ni bye tshigs dri ma can// bye ma'i zla khu zhes bya'o// zhes bya ba la/ gcin nad bye ma'i za khu zhes bya ba ni bye ma'i tshigs
200a6(gso rig): ma 'dra bar dri ma 'dus pa'i gzugs can 'dra ba dag tu 'byung ba yin no// gcin snyi mang po 'byung zhing bsil// mngar ba de bsil za khu yin// zhes bya ba la/ gcin nang gsil ba'i za khro zhes bya ba ni gcin
200b1(gso rig): 'byung ba'i reg pa bsil zhing mang du 'byung ba la ro mngar ba dag tu 'byung ba yin no// ngal gyis nyung zad nyung zad 'byung // bags gyis 'byung ba'i za khu yin/ zhes bya ba la/ gcin nAd bags kyis 'byung ba'i za khu zhes
200b2(gso rig): bya ba ni gcin 'byung ba'i rgyun ngal gyis nyung zad du chad cing chad cing 'byung ba yin// khu chu 'dra ba'i nal nal po// 'byil bag khu chu'i za dbu yin/ zhes bya ba la/ gtsin nad za khu 'dre ba ni kha chu 'dra bar nI za khu na la rnal
200b3(gso rig): por 'byung zhing 'byar bag can du 'byung ba yin no9de ltar bad kan las gyur pa'i gcin snyi ba bcur bshad pa yin// dri ro kha dog reg bya ni// nas tshigs 'khus 'dra nas tshigs can// zhes bya ba la/ gcin nad nas tshigs
200b4(gso rig): 'khus pa'i thA lo ba 'dra ba ni nas tshogs 'khus pa'i thal ba'i chu dang dri dang ro la sogs pa 'dra zhing mtshungs pa la bya'o// za khu ston po kho dog s+ho// zhes bya ba lA/ gAtsin na za khu sngon po zhes bya ba ni mang ba mra sngon po'i
200b5(gso rig): ba 'dra ba'i gcin 'byung ba la bya'o// za khu nag po snag tsha 'dra// zhes bya ba la/ za khu nag po snag tsha'i mdog ltar gcin nag po 'byung ba la bya'o// gtson sti tshwa zhing mdog ser po// de ni sbyor ba 'dra ba yin/ zhes bya ba
200b6(gso rig): lA/ gcin nang za khu skyer ba 'dra ba ni gcin tsha zhing gi cin gyis mdog sbyar ba'i khu ba 'dra ba 'byung ba yin no// mnam zhing bcod kyi za khu 'dro// btsod kyi b+ha khu zhes bya'o// zhes bya ba la/ zo khu bcang 'dra ba zhes bya ba
200b7(gso rig): ni dI mnam zhing btsod kyi bu mo 'dra ba mnam pa'i gcin 'byung ba la bya'o// dring ma zhing la rgyur ba caso// khrug 'ang+gA klag sa su las zhes bya ba gsas rgyu ba ni dru ni 'arnas pa la ma tshi gtses byang pa dang / lu zang lan tshwa bro ba dang / khrag mdo/ dra po byu ba yid te/ stor nam bris pa las gyur ba'i gcin sti ba'i nang drugo
201a1(gso rig): ni mnam zhang bcad kyi khu bA 'dra ba mnam pa'i gcan 'byung ba la bya'o// drung cha nang lan tshwar bshad pa yin no// zhag gi za khu zhag dang 'dres// zhag nyid gcin du 'byung ba yin// zhes bya ba la/ rga khu
201a2(gso rig): zhag 'dra ba ni/ zhag 'dren mar 'byung ba 'am/ zhag nyid gcin gyi rnam par 'byung ba yi no// rkang 'dres pa 'am rkang nyid ni// yang dang yang 'byung rkang za khu// zhes bya ba la/ za khu rkang 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni/ rkang dang 'dres pa dang
201a3(gso rig): rkang nyid yang dang yang du gcin du zla khur 'byung ba ni/ gcin dang rkang 'dra ba'i za khu zhes bya'o// glung chen myos ltar rgyun du ni// gcin shugs dal bar 'byung 'gyur ba// chu ser bcas shing rnyog bcas 'byung // glang chen za khru
201a4(gso rig): zhes bya'o// zhes bya ba la/ glang po che'i za khu ni glang po che dregs pas myos pa ltar rgyun du 'byung zhing gcin gyi shugs ngal gyis 'dzag cing 'byung bar 'gyur la/ chu ser dang bcas par 'byung zhing 'dzag par 'gyur pa la bya'o//
201a5(gso rig): sbrang rtsi'i za khu sbyong rtsi 'dra// zhes bya ba la/ za khu sbrang rtsi 'dra ba zhes bya ba la/ spring rtsi dang 'dra zhing ro yang bka' ba dang mngar bar 'byung ba yin no// de ni rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur// lus zungs zad pas rlung 'khrugos
201a6(gso rig): ba 'am/ nad kyis rtsa sbubs bkag ste 'byung / zhes bya ba la/ sbrang rtsi 'dra ba'i za khu de ni/ rnam pa gnyis su 'byung bar 'gyur ro// zhes grag ste/ lus zungs rnams zad pa las// rlung 'khrugs pas nang du gyur pa'i
201b1(gso rig): gcin yin no// yang na nad gzhi gsum gang yang rung bas rtsa sbubs bkag ste/ rlung rgyur ma ster ba las byung ba ni rnam pa gnyis pa yin no// nad kyis bkag pa'i mtshan ma dag/ de ni rgyu med par 'byung zhing / skad cig zad stobs
201b2(gso rig): gang 'gyur ba// gso bar dka' ba nyid du 'gyur// zhes bya ba la/ za gu sbrang rtsi 'dri ba zhes bya ba de/ rlung la sogs pa'i nad kyis lgang ba'i nad kyis lhung ba'i kha bkag cing / smyu gu 'gags par byas pa'i mtshan ma 'am
201b3(gso rig): rtags ni 'byung zhing skye ba'i rgyu med par skad cig cing stongs par 'gyur la/ stongs pa nyid las kyang / rgyud 'ga' 'gengs shing gang ba lta bur snang bar 'gyur te/ de ni gso bar dka' ba nyid yin no// thams cad dus
201b4(gso rig): su btsas na/ sbrang rtsi 'dra ba'i za khur 'byung // gra zhig thams cad mngar gyur pas/ phal cher sbrang rtsi'i zla khu yin// sbrang rtsi'i za khu zhes byi kun// mngar ba las ni bshad pa yin/ zhes bya ba la/ gcin nad za
201b5(gso rig): khu thams cad kyang sbrang rtsi'i za khu zhes bya ste/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ de thams cad dus su mra bcos shing ma grasos na sbrang rtsi 'dri ba'i za khur 'gyur ba dang / yang gang zhig gcin nad thams cad lus mngar ba'i bag
201b6(gso rig): las mngar bar 'gyur cing / phal cher spring rtsi lta bu'i mdog can yin pas sbrang rtsi'i za khu zhes bya ba'i sgrar bshad do// zas mi 'ju zhing yi ga 'chus// smon lung gnyid che cham pas 'debs// bad kan las
202a1(gso rig): byung za khu la// bla gnyan de dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bya ba la/ bad kan las byung ba'i za khyA la ni zas mi 'ju ba la sogs pa'i bla gnyan 'byung bar 'gyur ro// po mtshan lhung par zug pa dang /
202a2(gso rig): rlig 'bras bye zhing rims gyis 'debs// cha skyur skom dang brgyal dang 'khrug/ mkhris pa las gyur bla gnyen yan// zhes bya ba la/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'i gcin nad la ni pho mtshan dang lgang pa'i phyogs su khab
202a3(gso rig): kyis phug po ltar zug pa dang / rlig 'bras bye bar 'gyur pa la sogs pa'i bla gnyen 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rlung las skyes pa'i snying 'phar zhing // lus 'dar snying na zas la brkam// gnyer zhing gnyid med skem pa
202a4(gso rig): dang / lung pa dbugs mi bde ba 'byung / zhes bya ba la/ rlung las gyur pa'i za khu'i nAd la ni snying 'pha re ba la sogs pa'i blo gnyan 'byung bar 'gyur ro// kham pheMr ru sbal 'dra ba can// dgu po me dpal phra mo dang /
202a5(gso rig): sran chung 'dra dang yungs kar 'dra// bu bcas 'byung dang bi da re khing 'bras zhes bya'i 'bras 'bum bcu// gcin nad ma bcos pa las 'byung // tshigs dang gnang dang sha che ba'i// srog gis gnas su 'byung bar
202a6(gso rig): 'gyur// zhes bya ba la/ gcin nad za khu de ma btsos pa las ni kham phor 'dra po la sogs pa'i 'brel kyis nang bcu po 'byung bar 'gyur la/ de yang khyad par du ni tshigs dang gnad rnams dang / sha tshon la so
202b1(gso rig): ba srog gi gnas su 'byung zhing skye bar 'gyur ro// mtha' ni mtho zhing dbus ma dma'// gnag cing rnag la nad ces pa/ dbyibs la sogs dang tshad ni kham phor 'dra// nor bu kham phor zhes bya'o// 'bres gang mtha'
202b2(gso rig): ma kun nas mtho zhing dbus dma'o bar 'dug pas kham phor gyi dbyibs 'dra la// kha dog gnag cing rnag dang na du bcas po ni 'bras sam thor bu kham phor lta bu zhes bya'o// nang du zug cing na byed la/ nyen 'khor dag
202b3(gso rig): tu cher mched cing 'jam zhing ru sbrul rgyu ba 'dra ba'i/ 'bras nAng ru stsol zhes bya// zhes bya ba la/ ru sbal can zhes bya ba'i 'bras nad ni nang du shas cher zug cing na bor byed la/ rtsa ba'i nye 'khor du mched ces sgom
202b4(gso rig): pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan po yin no// sra zhing rtswa yi dra bA can// sgyu mo zhing 'dzagau lA khyon che ba dang // nA zhing mang zug bu ga ni// phra mor ldan pa dra ba can// zhes bya ba la/ thor bu dra ba can zhes bya ba ni sra zhing brtsub
202b5(gso rig): ba dang / rtswa ris kyi dri bas khebs pa dang / snum pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa yin no// nang du zug cing na ba rnams// rgyab bam lto ba dag tu ni// thor bu chen po kha dog gnag/ dgu por 'dug pas sku bor
202b6(gso rig): bshad// ces bya ba la/ 'bras nad sgur po ri/ zhes bya ba ni/ nad tshabs che zhing nad du zug la rnams kyang nad du rnams kyang pa ni/ rgyab la sogs pa'i phyogs gang yang rung bar skye ba yin no// skyes ma thag tu lpags
203a1(gso rig): pa tsha/ shin tu nA byed me dbul te// dmar zhing gnag lags pa dang / tsha zhing rnags byed me dpal phra// zhes bya ba la/ me dpal phra mo zhes bya ba'i nang ni skyes ma thag gi rjes thogs nyid la pags
203a2(gso rig): pa tsha zhing bsreg pa snyamA du sems la/ shin tu na ba'i me dpal kun tu mched cing par byed cing mdog dmar ba la sogs pa'i khyad par dong ldan pa yin no// sran chung dang ni chang dang dbyi bas// mnyam pas sran chung can yin
203a3(gso rig): te/ tshang dang dbyibs ni yung sA kar 'dra// myur du smin cing nad tshab sna che// zhes bya ba la/ 'bum bu sran chung zhes bya ba ni tshad dang dbyibyas srin chung dang 'dra ba yin no// de bzhin du tshad dang dbyibs yungs kar 'dre ba'i
203a4(gso rig): 'brum phran yang yod de/ de ni myur du smin cing nod tshabs che ba yin no// yungs kar 'du ba'i 'brum phran gyis// yongs su bskor bas shur bu can// bu bcas che zhing mang ba la// rab phra'i 'brum byas bye ba gyur
203a5(gso rig): bla'o// zhes bya ba la/ 'bras nA dI bu btsos zhes bya ba ni yungs kar 'dra ba'i 'brum phran gyi yongs su bskor cing / de bzhin du lhun che ba dang / ming zhing shin tu phra ba dang / du mas khyab cing g.yog pa yi no// zlum bu

203b1(gso rig): pa yin zhes bya ba la/ khong 'bras zhes bya ba'i nad ni skabs gzhan du bshad de/ 'di'i rjes thogs kyis le'u las bshad pa yin no// de la dang po'i 'bras nang gsum// bu bcas dang ni bI da rI// tshil chen las byung
203b2(gso rig): ba rnam dka'o yin// zhes bya ba la/ de lo 'bras kyi nad 'di dag gi nang nas dang po'i gsum por/ zhes bya ba dang / ru sbal zhes bya ba dang / dra ba can zhes bya ba gsum dang / bu bcas dang bi da ri zhes bya ba lnga po gal te

203b5(gso rig): 'bras bu'i nang de rnams nI gcin sgri ba'i nad kyis dpung las byung zhing rang rang gi nad ji ltar shas che ba bzhin du// ng+ge'i rnam par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ bad kan gyi swA b+hA khu las ni bangad kan shas rgyu bar 'gyur lha/ rlung dang
203b6(gso rig): mkhris pa dang shas che ba'i za bu las kyang rlung dang mkhris pa yi 'bras nang du 'gyur ro// 'di dag za khu med par ni// gnod gyur tshol las 'byung 'gyur te/ ji srid dngos po mi snang ba// de srid shes par mi 'gyuraro//
204a1(gso rig): zhes bya ba la/ thor bur nud 'di dag ni za khu'i nad med par mi tshil ches pa las nad gyur pa dag las yang 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ni ji srid rang gi dngos po lto dang rgyal sogs par gsal por mi
204a2(gso rig): snang byu de srid kyis bar du shes shing rtogs par mi 'gyur ro// kha dog ltung bya 'am dmar pa 'am ltung ba'i gcin// g+ha ru'i sngon tshul med pa yi// glucan 'byung gad dI ba glu min// de ni khrag ma khris yin shes bya// zhes bya ba la/

204a4(gso rig): yan lag mnam zhing lhod pa dang / stan dang mal dang gnyid kyi bde la chags// snying mig rna ba kha lce byugs snyam byed// lus sboms skra dang ser mo ring ba dang // bsil bag dga' zhing grA ba rkan ska mas shing // kha

204b6(gso rig): bya ba la/ sngon byung ba'i tshul lus rdul ba la sogs pa dang bcas par 'byung ba'i bad kan dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa'i za gu ni gso dka' ba yin la/ de bzhin du gang yang rim gyis bang kan la sogs pa las

205b5(gso rig): bya ba la/ nAng gi khong 'bras ni shin tu mi bzad cing brnag byar dka' bar na bA dang / gting ring zhing nang du nub pa dang / skran ltar sri zhing ram rim por gnas pa dang / grog mkhar gyi sa spungs pa'i rtse me ltar mtho bar gnas
205b6(gso rig): po dang / phyi'i khong 'bras pas nang gi khong 'bras myur du gsod par byed pa yin te/ de yang me dang mtshon gyis myur du gsod par byed pa dang 'dra bar 'dir yang myur du gsod par byed pa yin no// lte ba chu so mchin mtshar pa//
206a1(gso rig): glo dang snying lto brla rtsa dang / mkhal mA gnyis sam gzhung du'ang 'byung zhes bya ba la/ khong 'bras de ni lte ba dang chu so la sogs pa'i gnas gang yang rung ba'i lus kyi phyogs gcig du 'byung bar
206a2(gso rig): gyur pa yin no// de la rlung gyur nad chibs drags// dmar nag ring zhig lon nas ni// 'byung zhing smin byi dbyibs ma snyoms// ran cing mgo 'khor spro bA dang / g.yo zhing 'pho zhing sgra dang bcas// zhes bya ba la/ kheng 'bras
