206a4(gso rig): snyoms pa dang / tshang ha cang mi che zhing ran pa la sogs pa yin no// mkhris gyur zangs ltar dmar rtswa gnag/ skom dang tsha rims rmongs pa ga smad// ljang zhing smin pa myur dbang yin// zhes bya ba la/ mkhris pa las gyur
206a5(gso rig): pa'i rmongs brag ni/ mdog dmar ba lta sogs pa gang yang rung ba dang ldan pa dang / sgom pa la sogs pa dang ldan par ldang zhing 'byung ba dang / sbyin cing rnags pa myur ba yin no// bad kan las sku g.ya' dang bcas//
206a6(gso rig): rlon zhing bsil la sra ba dang / glal zhing lci la yi ga 'chus// 'byung zhing smin pa yun ring thogs// zhes bya ba la/ de la bde kan las gyur pa'i khong 'bras ni kha dog dkar zhing skya ba dang / g.ya' ba la sogs pa'i nad dang
206b1(gso rig): bcas pa dang / 'byung ba dang smin pa'i dus yun ring du mgror ba yin no// 'dus pa las gyur 'dren ma yin// zhes bya ba la/ 'dus pa la/ 'dus pa las gyur pa'i khyong 'bras ni mtshan nyid 'dren ma dang ldan pa yin par
206b2(gso rig): khong du chud par bya'o// 'dir ni phyi nang gnyis mtshan nyid don gyi dbang las shes par bya// zhes bya ba la/ khong 'bras bzhi po 'dir rab tu na pa dang shin tu mi bzad par na ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid kyis phyi dang nang
206b3(gso rig): gnyis kyi mtshan nyid don gyi dbang las shes par bya ste/ rigs mthun pa dang myi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid shes pa las phyi nang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dbye bar bya zhing shes par bya'o// de ni 'di skad ston te/ rlung las
206b4(gso rig): gyur pa'i khong 'bras kyi mtshan nyid phyi dang nang du rnam par phye ste/ me bshad mod kyi/ 'on kyang dmar ba nyid la sogs po'i phyi rol tu snang bar rigs po de ni nyid las shes par bya ba la gang yang lho spro ba dang /
206b5(gso rig): yi ge 'chus pa la sogs pa nang gi rnam pa yin par 'thad pa de ni de nyid kyi mtshan ma yin par shes par bya'o// 'brum bu nag pos khebs shing gnag/ rab tshan zhing rims kyis 'debs// mkhris pa'i rtags
206b6(gso rig): ldan phyi ma nang // khrag gyur bud med nyid la 'byung // zhes bya ba la/ khrag las gyur pa'i khong 'bras gang yin pa de ni 'brum bu nag pos khebs shing gang ba yin la/ mdog ni gnag pa yin zhing rab tu tsha ba la
207a1(gso rig): sogs pa dang ldan pa dang / mkhris pa'i rtags zangs ltar dmar ba dang sogs pa dang ldan pa de ni phyi'i yin yang rung nang gi yin yang rung ste/ de ni bud med kho na la 'byung gi skyes pa la ni ma yin/
207a2(gso rig): mtshon la sogs pas smras pa yis// rma byung mi 'phrod bsten pa las// rma kha'i tsha ba rlung gis phul// khrag bcaste mkhris po 'byung bar byed // khong 'bras bla gnyen ni mang zhing // khrag mkhris mtshan nyid can dag byed// rtse
207a3(gso rig): bya ba la/ gang mtshon dang rdo la sogs pas rmas shing snang bar gyur pa des rma 'byung ba dang / mi 'phrod pa'i kha zas bsten cing longs spyod pas rma kha'i tsha ba rlung gis phul zhing bskyod pas khrig dang bcas pa'i mkhris pa 'byung
207a4(gso rig): zhing 'dzag par 'gyur ba de las/ khong 'bras bla gnyen gyi nad mang zhing khrag dang mkhris pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bla gnyen de'i dbye ba yang // gnad kyi dbye ba las bshad do// zhes bya ba la/
207a5(gso rig): khong 'bras de rnams kyi bla gnyen nang bla thabs su byung ba dor dbye ba ni/ rang rang gi gnas sam rten gyi dbye ba las tha dad par gyur par drang srong rnams kyis bshad do// lte bar byung na skyigs bu ste// zhes bya ba la/
207a6(gso rig): khong 'bras de lte bar byung na bla gnyen skyegs su zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chu sor gcin 'gags rnag tu 'gyur// zhes bya ba la/ chu sor khong 'bras byung na gcin 'gags shing 'byung dka' la/ rnag dang
207b1(gso rig): bcas shing dri mnam par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mcher ba dbugs mi bde// zhes bya ba la/ mtshar par khong 'bras byung na dbugs mi bde ba'i bla gnyan 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mchin par dbugs 'byung 'gag skom mgo
207b2(gso rig): 'khor 'gyur zhes bya ba la/ mchin par khong 'bras byung na dbugs 'byung ba 'gog cing skom dang dang / mgo mkhor ba'i nAd kyis 'debs pa'i bla gnyen 'byung bar 'gyuraro// glo bar byung na lkog nad 'gyur zhes bya
207b3(gso rig): ba la/ khong 'bras glo bAr byung nA rkog ma'i nad rnams su 'gyur ro// snying byung yan lag kun gzer snyam// ma rmongs mun sros snyam du byed// snying 'phar na bar 'gyur pa yin/ zhes bya ba la/ khong 'bras snying li byung na
207b4(gso rig): lus kyi yan lag kun snying ger shin tu gzer ba snyam sems shing bskyod mi nus pa lta bur 'gyur pa dang / de bzhin du rab tu rmongs shing 'du shes lto bar 'gyur ba dang / mun par zhugs pa snyam du sems pa dang / snying
207b5(gso rig): 'phar zhing g.yo ba dang / na ba dang bcus par 'gyur ro// lto ba rtsib logs phyag pa'i bar// na zhing lto spos 'byung bar 'gyur// zhes bya ba la/ khong 'bras lte bar dbyung na lci ba dang rtsib legs kyi bar dang /
207b6(gso rig): phrag pa gnyis kyi bar du na pa dang / lto ba de nyid sbos shing sgra 'khrul 'khrul zer ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chu so 'doms par byung brlan// zhes bya ba la/ khong 'bras chu si dang 'doms bar du byung brlan zhing 'gul
208a1(gso rig): mi shes par 'gyur ro// mkhal mar byung na rked pa rgyug/ rtsib logs su ni nu bar 'gyur// zhes bya ba la/ khrong 'bras mkhal ma gnyis su byung na rked pa dang rgyu ba dang rtsib logs su na
208a2(gso rig): zhing zug par 'gyur ro// gzhang du rlung ni phur 'byung 'gag/ ces bya ba la/ gnang gi nang du khod 'bras byung na rlung thur du 'byung ba'i gagos byed cing nang na 'khyil bar 'gyur ro// zhu dang ma zhu phyed nyid zhu// de dag 'or nang lha
208a3(gso rig): bur bshad// ces bya ba la/ zhu ba'i gnas dang ma zhu ba rI gnas dang byed tsam zhu bA s+t+waM/ legs par ma zhu bo'i gnas su byung ba de dog ni 'or nad dmo skad bag gi nad kyi mtshan nyid dang 'dra bar bshad de/ sgru ba
208a4(gso rig): chung ba nad tshabs chung zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gis ston to// lte ba ya na? smin khar 'dzag/ ces bya ba la/ khong 'bros lte ba yan chad kyi nang na yod pa de dag sbyin par gyur na kha'i sgo nas rnag pa la sogs
208a5(gso rig): pa'i nang rnams 'dzeg cing 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lto ba man chad gzhang du 'dzag/ ces bya ba la/ lte ba man chad kyi nang na khong 'bras gnas pa las/ smin par gyur pa gang dag yin pa de gzhing gi sgor rnag pa
208a6(gso rig): la sogs pa 'dzag par 'gyur// lte bar gnas pa gnyis kar 'dzag/ ces bya ba la/ khong 'bras lte ba'i nang du byung na lus kyi dbus na gnas pa yin pa'i phyir kha dang gzhang gnyis ka nas byung zhing / 'dzag
208b1(gso rig): pa yin no// khong 'bras kyi ni nang dmigs rnams// mdzag las rmya ltar shes par bya// zhes bya ba la/ khong 'bras kyi nang gra'i rlung la sogs pa ni rang gi 'dzag pa ji lta ba las rma'i tshul bzhin du shes par bya'o//
208b2(gso rig): ji ltar rmil rnag dang gsher bag 'dzag pa'i tshul las nad gzhi'i tshul shes par bya bo mdo'i gnas su ji skad bshad pa de bzhin du 'dor yang tshul de dang 'dra ba brtag par bya'o// de las 'dus pa las gyur dang / snying dong lte
208b3(gso rig): pa chu sor gnas// phyi 'am nang du dbye ba 'am// sman te kha nas 'dzag pa ni// nyam chung bla gnyen ldan pa spang // zhes bya ba la 'dus pa las gyur pa'i bor 'bras pa bya yin pa de ni gsor mi rung bas spang bar bya'o// de bzhin du rlung la
208b4(gso rig): klas pa 'ba' zhig las gyur po yin yang snying ga dang lte ba dang chu sor gnas pa yang spang bar bya'o// de bzhin du ma bud med bu btsas pa'am/ d+hU ma ma nu zho yod pa dang / nu zho med pa'i nu ma yi// rtsa sgo kha byer phyin gyur nas/
208b5(gso rig): yi khong 'bras mtshan nyid can// skrangs shing sra ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ ji ltar khong 'bras zhes bya ba'i nad khongs su zos pa la stsogs pas skye ba bzhin du bud med bu btsas pa 'am/ spyom mo nu mar nu zho dang
208b6(gso rig): bcas pa 'am/ nu zho med pa'i nu ma'i rtsa kha bye bar phyin nas phyi'i khong 'bras kyi mtshan nyid rab tu na ba dang / mdud pa 'dra zhing mtho bo la sogs pa'i 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de yang spang ba dang sra ba'i rang bzhin can du 'thung
209a1(gso rig): bar 'gyur te/ de ni nu ma'i khong 'bras zhes bya ba yin no// bu mo rnams kyang nu rtse'i sgo// phra bas 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba la/ nu ma'i khong 'bras de ni bu mo gzhon nu lnga 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ ci'i
209a2(gso rig): phyir zhe na/ de'i nu ma'i rtswa sgro shin+da tu phra bas de 'byung bar mi 'gyur pa yin no// rlung ni rgyu lam 'gags pas 'khrugs// skang dang gzer ni spyod cing rgyu// chu so rlig por phyin pa dang // rlig par rgyu ba'i rtse dag ni// brtsir nas rlig pa pags
209a3(gso rig): po dang / 'phel zhing rlig blugs nyid du byed// ces bya ba la/ rlung rang gi rgyu ba'i lam// 'gegs shing phan tshun rgyu ba'i go skabs chung bar gyur pos 'khru gas shing nad skyed pa nA skrangs pa dang gzo ra ba'i nad bskyed cing rgyu nas rlig pa sbyangs
209a4(gso rig): par byed cing / chu so dang rlig par phyin nas de la brten mchin po'i gnas su rgyu ba'i rtsa dag rab tu btsir zhing gi nod byar byas nas rlig pa dang pags pa 'phel zhing rgyas pa'i rlig blugs nyid byed par 'gyur ro// nad khrag gcin tshol
209a5(gso rig): rgyu mo las// rlig blugs de ni rnam bdun 'gyur// zhes bya ba la/ rlig blugs zhes bya ba'i nang de ni nad dmigs so dang khrag las byung ba dang / gcin dang tshil dang rgyu ma las byung ba ste rnam pa bdun yin no// rgyu ma gcin skyes pa
209a6(gso rig): 'am rlung // rgyu ma'i dbye ba 'ba' zhig gzhan// zhes bya ba la/ rgyu ma 'am gcin las skyes pa'i rlig blugs dag kyang rlung las gyur pa dang 'dra mod kyi/ rgyu 'ba' zhig gi dbye bas tha dad pa yin zhing gzhan mi yin no// rlung gyur
209b1(gso rig): gyur rkyal ba gang 'dra zhing // reg na rtsub cing rgyu med na/ zhes bya ba la/ rlung las gyur pa'i rlig blugs ni// reg na rkyal pa rlung gis gang ba 'dra zhing reg na rtsub pa dang / de bzhin du rgyu myed par glo bur du na par byed pa yin no// mkhris
209b2(gso rig): gyur u dum+bA ra yi// 'bras bu smin 'dri tsha dro 'dril// zhes bya bo la/ mkhri s+dzi pA las gyur pa'i rlig blugs kyi nang ni/ u dum+bA raM'i babras bu smin pa dang mdog 'dri la/ de bzhin du tsha ba l-i sogs pa dang ldan pa yInau// bad kan las bsil
209b3(gso rig): lci zhing snum// g.ya' zhing sra li nAd tshabs chung // skye byab la/ khro kan las gyur pa'i rlig blugs kyi nad ni bsil ba la stsogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no// khrig gyur rnag cing 'bum bus khya ba// mkhris pa'i rlig blugs mtshan nyid ldan//
209b4(gso rig): zhes bya ba la/ khrag las gyur pa'i rlig blugs ni snag tsha ltar gnag cing 'brum bu nag pos khyab pA dang / mkhris pa'i rlig blugs kyi mtshan nyid u dum+bA ra'i 'bras bu sbyin pa dang 'dra ba lo sogs pa dang ldan pa yin no tshil gyur rlig
209b5(gso rig): blugs bad kan 'dra// 'jam zhing tA la'i 'bras bur mtshungs zhes bya ba l-i/ tshil las gyur pa'i rlig blugs kyi nad ni bsil zhing snum pa la sogs pa bad kan gyi mtshan nyid dang 'dra ba dang / yang de 'jam zhing tA la'i 'bras
209b6(gso rig): bu dang mtshungs shing 'dra ba yin no// gcin ma nags pa laM brten po rnams// gcin las 'byung bar de 'gyur te/ rgyal ba chu yis gang ba ltar// g.yo gyur nad dang bcas shing 'jam// gcin 'gags pa dang rlig pa yis//
210a1(gso rig): 'og tu sgrud par byed par 'gyur// zhes bya ba la/ gcin snyoms las brnags shing nan gyis 'gegs par byed pa la brten pa'i skyes bu rnams la nI gcin las byung ba'i rlig rlugs 'byung bar 'gyur te de ni rgyal
210a2(gso rig): pa chus gang pa ltar g.yo zhing mgul por 'khrugs par 'gyur la/ de yang ning dang bcas shing 'jam zhing mnyen par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du gtson 'gegs shing sri ba dang / de bzhin du rig pa'i 'og tu gdu bu ltar skrangs
210a3(gso rig): par byed par byed par 'gyur ro// rlu 'khrugs pa yi zas dang ni// chu grang la nI rgyu lta ba dang / shugs bkag bcitsir dang 'khur dang lam// yan lag log par gcus pa dang // rlung 'khrugs pa ni gzhan gyis kyang // gang tshe rgyu ma bla mo'i
210a4(gso rig): cha rlung gis log par phul gyur to// rang gi gnas nas thur du bsgying // chu so'i tshogs su phyin pa dang // de tshe mdud pa ltar rlor 'gyur// zhes bya ba la/ rlung 'khrugs par byed pa'i kha zas rtsub pa dang bsku ba la sogs pa bsten pa
210a5(gso rig): dang / de bzhin du chu grang mo la rgyal gyis brgal ba drang / de bzhin du bai shad gaN+DI la sogs pa'i shugs 'byung ba bkag pa dang / n+dan gyis br-its+tshir ba dang / khur ba la sogs pas gnod par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gzhan dag gis rlung
210a6(gso rig): 'khrugs par gyur pa'i dus gang gis tshe rgyu ma phra mo'i cha ste rgyu ma phre'u phyogs gcig log par phul ti rang gi gnas nas thur du bskyod cing chu so'i tshigs su rlung gnas pa de'i tshe mdud pa ltar glo ba'i skang brag skyed par 'gyur ro//
210b1(gso rig): yal bar bor na rlig pa cher skye zhing / skyo zhing na la rengs par rlung gis byed// rab tu gzer zhing nang na sgra dang bcas// gang bar byed cing bcug kyang slar 'byung byed // ces bya ba la/ nang de yal bar bor zhing gso ba ma byas na rlig pa
210b2(gso rig): skye zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / lto spro zhing rengs par rlung des bskyod par byed pa dang / yang rlung gis rab tu gzir cing nyen pas nAng na sgra dang bcas shing klul ku la zer ba dang / yang rlung gis gang bar byed cing phyung ba dro bcug kyang
210b3(gso rig): slor 'byung bar byed pa yin no// rgyu blugs 'di ni gso dAkau Sha ste// rlung gis rlig blugs 'dra ba yi// rtsub cang mnag la dmar ba'i rtswas// phra mo'i dra bas khaM bas pa yin// zhes bya ba la/ rgyu thugs zhes bya ba'i nAd 'di ni gso
210b4(gso rig): dka' zhing bcos par mi nus pra yin la/ yang de ni rlung gi rlig blugs drang mtshan mi 'dra ba yin te/ rlung gyur rkyal pa gang 'dra zhing // reg na rtsub cing rgyu med na/ zhes bya ba'i gzhung gis bstan pa yin no// yang de bzhin du rtsub cing
210b5(gso rig): mdog gnag la rtsa dmar ba'i rtswa'i tshogs phra mo'i dra bas khebs shing khyad par 'gyur ba yin no// skran brgyad nad ni so so dang // 'dres dang 'dus pa las gyur dang / zla ba mtshan gyi ni nyes pa yis// brgyad pa bud med rnams
210b6(gso rig): la 'byung // zhes bya ba la/ sman ni rnam pa brgyad yod do// de yang rlung la sogs pa nang gzhi so so las byung ba gsum dang / nang gzhi gnyis gnyis 'dres pa'i ldan pa las gyur pa ga sum dang / nang gzhi gsum
211a1(gso rig): char 'dus pa las gyur pa cig dang / bud med rnams la zla mtshan gyi nad kyi nyes pa las byung ba gcig ste/ de ltar na spyir brgyud yin no// rims dang smon dang tshad 'khru sogs// smyug sman sogs dang
211a2(gso rig): las rnams kyis// skem gyur rlung skyes zas za dang // bsres te chu grang 'thungs gyur pa'am// skom 'thungs rjes la grang zhig ni// brgyal ba 'phyo ba la sogs pa// rten pas lus ni phugs byas pas// sleb mi bro yang skyug pa
211a3(gso rig): dang / rlung la sogs pa 'byung ba'o// shugs bkag pa 'am btsir ba dang // snum dang dug ni ma brten par// sbyangs pa'i las ni byed pa'am// sbyongs zin myur du tsha ba dang // bad kan skyed pa'i zos skom sbyang // rlung rgyas pa yi
211a4(gso rig): nang rnams ni// so so'am 'dris pa'am 'khrugs gyur pa'am// kun nas khrag dang bcas 'khrugs pas// sngags can la ni brten gyur nas// steng 'og lam ni bkag nas su// gzer sngon 'gro zhing reg tu rung // shin tu mthong zhing
211a5(gso rig): mdud pa'i gzugs// skran nI skyed par 'gyur ba yin zhes bya ba la/ snyun 'byung ba'i rgyu ni rims la sogs pa'i nad rnams dang / de bzhin du skyugs sman la sogs pa ste// skyug sman+da dang bkra sman dang / bkru spyan drag po ma btang
211a6(gso rig): ba dang / 'jam rtsi dang mgo bo'o bkun sman zhes bya ba'i dpyod kyis sbyor ba nyes pa dang / de bzhin du drag shul gyi nang rnams kyis skem zhing sgeg par gyur pa dang // rlung skyes pa'i zas rtsub tsang kha ba la sogs pa za ba dang /
211b1(gso rig): de bzhin du dkres shing zas za bar 'dod pa'i skabs su zas ma zos par chu grang mo 'thungs pa 'am/ yang na skom 'thungs pa'i rjes la rgyal ba dang mchod pa dang / nyal po bsten pa dang / rta rgyug pa la sogs pa la brten cing / lus
211b2(gso rig): 'khrugs zhing bskyod par byas pa dang / yang na sgron mi bro bzhin du nun gyis smon zhing skyugs pa dang / rlung dang bshang gci la sogs pa'i shugs par sdog bzhin du nan gyis bkag cing mi nag pa dang / de dag nan gyis btsir ba
211b3(gso rig): ba dang / yang na sna ma dang dugs kyi cho ga yang dang yang du bya ba ma brten cing goms pa ra ma byas par sbyad pa'i las skyugs sman la sogs pa btang ba dang / yang na sbyangs zin cing skyugs sman btang ba la sogs pu byas zin pa'i
211b4(gso rig): rjes thogs nyid la myur bar lus tsha bar byed pa'i zas skom la brtan pa dang / de bzhin du bang kan+da skyed cing ldan ljin 'phel ba'i zas skom longs spyad pa dang / de bzhin du rlung rgyas shing 'phel ba'i nad kyi dri mo rnams
211b5(gso rig): so sor 'khrugs par 'gyur ba 'am/ gnyis 'dres pa'i ldan par 'khrugs pa 'am/ yang na nang gzhi thams cad 'khrugs pa'am/ khrag dang bcas par 'khrugs shing g.yos pas sbubs chen po ste/ lto ba zhes bya ba'i
211b6(gso rig): lus kyi dbus kyi cha de la brten cing gnas nas de'i 'og tu rtsa bo che'i nang du zhugs te/ steng dang 'og gi lam bkag nas skran skyed par 'gyur la de yang gzer sngon du 'gro ba'i sgo nas nad skyed par 'gyur zhing / reg
212a1(gso rig): tu rung ba shin tu mthong zhing 'bur bar mdud pa'i gzugs can ltar ril ril por gnas pa'i spyan zhes bya ba de skyed par 'gyur ba yin no// skem pas bad kan mkhris bshang ba'i// rgyun srang
212a2(gso rig): 'gags par gyur pa yin// rlung ni khong par gnas bcas pa// rtsub bris smra bar gyur pa yin// rang gnas ldang gyur rang dbang can// gzhan gnas la brten gzhan dbang can// gong por gyur pas gzugs med kyang //
212a3(gso rig): gzugs can+da ltar gnas skran zhes bya// chu so lte ba snying ga dang // rtsib logs la ni gnas pa yin// zhes bya ba la/ skem zhing lus zungs zad pas ldan 'ga' zhig rlung 'khrugs shing ldang par 'gyur la/ lan
212a4(gso rig): 'ga' zhig ni bad kan dang mkhris po dang bshang ga'i rgyu ba'i bu ga'i lam srang 'gags par 'gyur bus 'khrugs par 'gyur la/ 'khrugs pa'i rlung de khong pa'i nang du gnas bcas shing brten par gyur pa
212a5(gso rig): yin la/ de nas rtsub pa'i rgyus sra zhing mkhyud bar gyur pa yin la/ rlung de rang gi gnas na gnas pa'i tshe na ni rang dbang can zhes bya ba la/ rang gi gnas pang kan dang mkhris pa'i gnas la brten pa'i tshe na ni
212a6(gso rig): gzhan dbang can zhes bya'o// yang nad de ni gong por gnas pas na reg tu rung bar gyur pas// rlung de gzugs med pa ste sra ba ma yin du zin kyang gzugs can lta bur gnas shing mdud pa'i gzugs su 'dug pas
212b1(gso rig): ming skran zhes btags pa yin no// de yang chu so la sogs pa'i gnas la gnas pa yin te/ chu so dang lte ba dang snying ga dang rtsib log g.yas g.yon te ltar gnas par yin no// rlung las mchin pa klang bar gzer// rims 'debs
212b2(gso rig): mtshar na rgyu mu 'khrug/ bshang sri khab kyis btsags snyam na// dbugs 'byin yang dang yang mi phyin// lus rengs kha ni skam pa dang // skems zhing me dring mi snyoms dang // pags sogs gnag cing rtsub pa dang // rlung skran g.yo ba
212b3(gso rig): yin pa'i phyir// dbyibs ni brtag par mi mngon zhing // gnas 'phel 'bri dong na ba dang // grog mos khyab pa lta bu ni// skran ni 'gul zhing zug pa yin// zhes bya ba la/ rlung las gyur pa'i skran nad ni mdzad pa dang / klad par gzer
212b4(gso rig): ba la sogs pa'i nad kyis 'debs par 'gyur ba dang / khab kyi btsags pa snyam du na zhing zug pa dang / dbugs 'byin pa dka' zhing yang dang yang du mi thon pa dang / lus rengs zhing 'gyur mi shes pa dang / skam zhing rid pa dang /
212b5(gso rig): pags pa dang mig dang sngon mo dang gdong lce la sogs pa gnag pa dang / rlung gi rang bzhin g.yos zhing mi brtan pa yin pa'i phyir dbyibs dang rang bzhin brtag par dka' zhing gnas gcig na mi 'dug pa dang / 'phel ba dang
212b6(gso rig): 'bri bar snang ba dang / na zhing zug pa dang gra mas khyab cing gang ba lta bur smyan de 'gul ba dang / zug cing na ba yin no// mkhris po las tsha zhing sgregs sgyur brgyal// 'khru zhing lus rdul skoms rims 'debs// pags pa la
213a1(gso rig): sogs ser por snang // skran ni reg par mi bzod dang // tsha zhing 'bar lA dro pa dang // rang gi gnas ni bsregs snyam byed// ces bya ba la/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'i skran ni tsha ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid
213a2(gso rig): dang ldan pa dang / skran myang zhing reg par mi bzod cing na ba dang / tsha 'ur 'ur po la sogs pa dang ldan pa yino// khang kan slong bag yi ga 'chis// me drod nyams shing grang rims 'debs// cham pa khong snyoms dang ga lci// lud pa lu zhing phag
213a3(gso rig): sogs dkar// skran phugs ring zhing skrang pa dang // lci zhing rang gnas brtag nang chung // zhes bya ba la/ bang kan las gyur pa'i skran nad ni slong bag la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i na zhing pags pa dang sen mo la sogs pa dkar zhing skya ba dang /
213a4(gso rig): dri bzhin du sman phyogs ring zhing rdo ltar sra ba dang / lci zhing tsher ba med pa lta bu dang / rang gi gnas na brtan par gnas shing mi 'gyur ba dang / nang tshwa bas chung zhing rgyu ba ngal ba yin no// phal char rang gnas 'dug pa dang / rang
213a5(gso rig): gis dus su nang skyed byed// ces bya ba la/ skran de dag ni phal cher nang rang rang gi gnas na 'dug cing rten la rang gi ldang ba'i dus su nad skyed par byed pa yin no// de yang rlung lus gyur pa'i skran nad phal cher ni dku'i phyogs su gnas
213a6(gso rig): la/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'i skan ni phal cher lte ba la gnas so// bang kan las gyur pa'i skan ni phal cher rtsi ba logs gnyis dngo snying gor gnas so// rang gi dus ni nyin mtshan dang zas zos pa la sogs bau pa nang rang rang
213b1(gso rig): 'byung ba'i dus su/ rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan+da las gyur pa'i sman lhag par ldang zhing na bar 'gyur ro// gnyis las byung ba'i spyan gsum po// mtshan nyid 'dres par ldan pa yin/ zhes bya b+ha la/ nang gzhi gnyis 'dres pa las byung ba'i
213b2(gso rig): skran gsum ni mtshan nyid gnyis po gang dag yin pa de'i tshe 'dren ma dang ldan pa yin no// kun skyes mi bzang na zhing cha// myur sbyin su mtho de gso dka'// zhes bya ba la/ nad gzhi gsum po kun 'dus pa las skyes pa'i spyan ni mtshan
213b3(gso rig): nyid thams cad dang ldan zhing / mi bzad par na ba dang / lhag par tsha ba dang / myur du sbyin pa dang slu zhing dpangs ma tho ba yin+ni ti/ de ni gso dka' ba yin pas gso dpyad kyis bcos kyang mi 'tsho'o// khrag gi skran ni gang yin pa/
213b4(gso rig): de ni bud med nyid la 'byung / zhes bya ba la/ skran brgyad pa khrag las gyur pa'i spyan ni bud med na 'byung gi skyes pa la ni 'byung bar mi 'gyur// zla mtshan dus sam bu gsar btsas// yang na mngal gyi nad can gyis// bud
213b5(gso rig): med rlung skyeng bsnyen gyur pas// rlung ni 'khrugs par gyur pa las// zla zer 'byung bar byed pa yi// zla mtshan mongal du bkag pas ni// de ni mngal chags 'drar snang zhing // mtshan ma gsal bar ston byed de// snying 'phar nu
213b6(gso rig): 'dzag yong mi bde// skem pa la sogs tshul du snang // zhes bya ba la/ zla mtshan dang ldan pa 'am/ zla mtshan gyi rus la bab pa bu gsar du btsas pa 'am/ zla bi ma tshang par mchil par gyur pa dang / yang na bud med mngal
214a1(gso rig): nang can gyis rlung skyed par byed pa'i zas dang skom bsten cing spyad par gyur pas/ bud med de'i rlung gi nang 'khrugs par gyur pa las zla ba re re zhing rgyu bar byed pa'i zla mtshan bkag cing phyir 'byung du mI ster
214a2(gso rig): bas zla re 'byung ba de mngal na bu 'chags pa lta bu ri tshul de gsogs shing 'phel bar gyur nas// mngal na du chags pa'i mtshan mi snang zhing gsal bar ston par byed/ snying 'phar ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma snang ba yin no//
214a3(gso rig): de ni rim gyis rlung 'dres dang // mkhris pa yi ni rgyu yis ma// rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i// skan ni khrag de skyong byed yin// na zhing sra la tshe zhing 'khru// skom dang rims sogs bla gnyan 'byung // nad kyi khrag la brten pas na// mngal
214a4(gso rig): gnas ngag tu lhag par gzer// mngal nas dri nge 'dzag pa dang / na zhing 'phar la zug par byed// ces bya ba la/ dus kyi rim gyis rlung dang khrag de 'odras shing 'dus par gyur pa dang / mkhris pa'i rgyur gyur pa nyid kyis na khrag de
214a5(gso rig): rlung dang mkhris pa las byung ba'i skran gyi nang khrig de skyes par byed cing bla gnyen gyi nang na zhing sra ba la sogs pa byung bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin du lhag par yang nad kyi khrag la brten cing gnas pas/ mngal gyi gnas su lhag
214a6(gso rig): par gzer zhing na ba dang / mngal nas dri nga 'dzag pa la sogs bau byed par 'gyur ro// mngal chags 'dra yang yan lag med// 'on kyang skran ni 'gul gzer ldan// de nyid der ni gong por gnas// lan 'ga' 'gul bar byed pa/
214b1(gso rig): yin du 'di ni ltor 'phel mi byed kyi// skran nyid 'phel bar byed pa yin// zhes bya nga la/ gal te khrag gi sman chags pa de mngal na bu chags pa dang cha 'dra na/ yang yan lag la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i sems can/ yod pa ma
214b2(gso rig): yin gyi/ 'on kyang 'gul zhing gzer ba dang ldan pa yin no// yang skran de nyid ni mngal gyi gnas der gong por gzugs can du gnas la/ lan 'ga' yun ring zhig nas 'gul bar byed pa yin no// yang 'di'i mngal du bu chags
214b3(gso rig): nas 'phel bar byed pa ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang 'gul zhing gzir ba dang ldan pa yin no// gzhan du khrag las chags pa'i skran nyid 'phel bar byed pa yin// rang gi nad gzhi lnga brten nas de der sgren nad thams cad skyed// yun
214b4(gso rig): ring na ni smin 'gyur ba 'am// yang na mi smin// zhes bya ba lA/ nAd rang rang gi nad gzhi'i tshul la brten cing gnas nas sman thams cad skye bar 'gyur ba yin la/ rgyu de na yun ring zhig na smin par 'gyur ba 'am/ yang ni smin par
214b5(gso rig): mi 'gyur ro// khong 'bras kyang / nang khrag lnga ni baurtun pa'i phyir// shin tu myur du smin par 'gyur// de phyir myur du tshwa 'gyur bas// khong 'bras zhes ni de la bshad// ces bya ba la/ yang khong 'bras su gyur na ni nang khrag shin
214b6(gso rig): tu gnod par byed pa la brten cing gnas pa yin pa'i phyir shin tu myur zhing rings par smin cing brdol bar 'gyur ro// de nyid kyi phyir myur du tsha zhing sreg par byed pas de la ming khong 'bras zhes bya bar bshad do// nang gnas
215a1(gso rig): smyan ni chu so dang // lto ba mchin pA snying na zhing // me drong kha dog nyams stobs 'bri// shugs ni 'gag par 'gyur ba yim zhes bya ba la/ nang nA gnas shing brten pa'i mtshan ma ni chu so la sogs par
215a2(gso rig): na ba dang / me drodang la sogs pa nyams shing 'bri ba ni bshang gcin la sogs pa'i shugs 'byung ba 'gags par 'gyur ba yin no// phyi rol de las bzlog po ste// khong pa'i yan lag na tsha bas chung // phyogs de mdog ni nyams pa
215a3(gso rig): dang / phyi rol tu ni mthong zhing 'phags// zhes bya ba la/ phyi rol tu byung ba'i skran ni nang du 'byung ba'i skan gyi mtshan ma nga las go bzlog pa yin te/ chu so la sogs par na bar mi 'gyur pa dang / me drod la sogs pa nyams
215a4(gso rig): par mi 'gyur ba dang / shugs mi 'gag cing bod blag tu 'byung ba dang khong pa'i yan lag lte ba la sogs par nud tshabs chung zhing shas chu bar ma nI ba dang / skran chags pa'i tshogs de'i mdog nyams shing kha dog gzhan du
215a5(gso rig): 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du phyi rol tu lhag par mthong zhing 'phags pa yin no// lto sgro lhag par mi bzang na// rgyu ma'i sgra bcas mi bzad na// spro bcas lto ba na bA dang // rlung gi nad kyis sted 'og bkag/ de nI hen gyi zhes byar bshad
215a6(gso rig): ces bya ba la/ lto bar spo zhing sgra dang bcas pa dang / steng 'og tu rlung gi lam bkag pas lhag par mi bzang bar na zhing / brnag par dka' ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa de ni/ lto spos han gyi nad ces bya ba yin par
215b1(gso rig): slob dpon gyis bshad do// sra zhing gtun 'dra mdud pa can// gtun 'dra gyen du mtho bar gnas// rkyen gyis mtshan ldan zhes bya ba la/ nang gang sra zhing rdo'i gtun 'dra zhing mdudu bA can+da du gnas la/ rdo dang dbyibs 'dra zhing gyen du mtho
215b2(gso rig): bar 'jong bag tu gnas pA hin gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa ni/ gtun 'dre ba zhes bya'o// gtun bu ni/ 'phreng gnas di ngang tshul 'dra yin/ zhes bya bA lwa/ gtun+na bu zhes bya ba'i nad ni 'phreng du thang kar gnas kyi/ gyen du 'gro ba
215b3(gso rig): ma yin la/ nad kyi tshul ni gtun 'dra ba dang mtshungs te/ de lta bu'i nang la ni gautun bu zhes bya'o// zhu ba'i gnas nas bshang pho mtsham rlung ni mi bzad ni zhing rgyu mo/ thur du zug par yang dag bshad// ces bya ba le/
215b4(gso rig): zhu ba'i gnas lte ba'i 'og nas gzhang dang pho mtshan dag tu rlung rgyu zhing / lhag par na bar byed pa de ni thur du zlog pa zhes bya'o// de las bzlog pa gyen du zug pa zhes bya ba la/ gyen du zug pa zhes bya ba'i nad ni de las bzlog pa ste/
215b5(gso rig): gzhang dang dang pho mtshan gyi gnas nas lte ba gyen du zug cing nA la gyen du zug pa zhes bya'o// sgregs pa myong zhing bshod pa 'gags pa dang / 'drangs za mi nus rgyum sgra dang bcas pa/ sgo zhing haun langs kha zlas 'ju mi nus//
215b6(gso rig): skran ni nyer 'byung mtshan ma yin par bshing / ces bya ba la/ mi gang la skyon nye bar 'ongs par 'gyur ba'i sngar 'byung ba'i tshul ni sgregs pa mang po yang ngang du 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / bshang ba 'gags shing sri ba dang /
216a1(gso rig): 'drangs shing tshim par za mi nus pa dang / rgyum+b+ha sgra dang bcas shing mi gsal ba'i sgra kral+yA klul zer ba dang / spo zhing lto rgyus la he na langs pa dang / me drong zhan pas kha zas 'ju bar mi byed pa ste/
216a2(gso rig): dag ni snyun ring po mi thogs par 'thung bar 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma yin par slob dpon gyi bstan cing bshad pa yin no// / yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'brel ba tshig gi don gyi
216a3(gso rig): zla zar zhes bya ba/ slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba la snga nang gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gcig pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o// // de nas dmu rdzings kyi ning gzhi bshad par bya'o// zhes bya ba la
216a4(gso rig): 'di ni khong 'bras la sogs pa dang / tshul 'dra bas 'di brtsams pa yin no// nang kun me drod nyams las skye// lhag par dmu rdzongs nad skye zhing // ma zhu dri mya can gyi zas// dri ma sogs lus skye bor 'gyur// zhes bya ba
216a5(gso rig): la gang gi phyir nad thams cad kyang pho ba'i me drod nyams pa las skye bar 'gyur ba yin med kyi/ khyad par du 'am/ lhag par dmu rdzing gis nang ni// pho bA'i me drong nyams pa las skye bur 'gyur la/ de bzhin du
216a6(gso rig): ma 'ju pa rnam pa bzhi dang / dri ma can gyis zas rul pa dang / zhag lon pa'i khengs po dang / 'dren ma la sogs pa skyen dang ldan bsten pa dang / de bzhin du/ nad kyi dri ma yun ring sogs shing 'phel bar
216b1(gso rig): 'gyur ba las/ dmu rdzing gi nang skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag nI nad kyi rgyu bstan pa yin no// nad kyi chu ni rgyu ba'i rtsa// steng dang 'og tu bkag nas ni// srog dang thur sel la gnod de// pags pa sha yi bar gnas nad // lto ba
216b2(gso rig): bkang ste dmu rdzings bskyed// ces bya ba la/ rlung la sogs pa'i nad kyis chu'i ma/ bang kun gyi tshogs rgyu bo'i rtsa lus kyi steng 'og tu rgyu ba bkag nas rgyu des srog ces bya ba'i rlung la sogs pa sna gnod cing 'khrugs par byas
216b3(gso rig): nas pags po deng shI'i bar na yod pa'i nad drings te/ lto ba bkang nas dmu rdzings bskyed cing 'byung bar byed pa yin no// dri yang rnams pa brgyad 'gyur to// nang gzhi tha dang lus mtshar ba// dri ma 'gags dang rgyu rdol dong /
216b4(gso rig): zhes bya ba la/ dmu rdzing de yang grangs kyi dbye ba rnam pa brgyad du 'gyur te/ rlung dang mo khris pa dang / bad kan gyi nang gzhi tha dad pa las byung ba gsum dang / gsum char 'dus pa las byung ba gcig dang / mtsho re ba las
216b5(gso rig): byung po dang / rgyu ma 'gegs pa'i dmu rdzingasau dang / rgyu mra rdol ba'i dmu rdzings dang / chu'i dmu rdzings ste rnam pa brgyad do// des gzir rkun+da dang mchu skams shing / rkang pa lag pa gsus pa skrangs// spyod pa kha zas nyams
216b6(gso rig): stobs bri// sbrum zhing gsus pa cher skyes la/ me no yi dgas gzu con 'gyur// zhes bye ba laM/ dmu rdzings nang nges gzer cing zhen pa'i mo ni rkan dang mochu skams par gyur pa dang / rkang pa dang lpags pa dang lto ba sbyang ba dang /
217a1(gso rig): lus kyi sbyong ba nyams pa dang / kha zas za ba'i rdol ba nyams pa dang / lus kyi nyams stobs bri zhing zang ba dang / skyems ning sha dang khrag zad pa dang / gsus pa cher skyes shing rgyas par 'gyur te/ mad /
217a2(gso rig): na mi dwe yi dgus kyi gzugs can lta bu 'am/ 'chi ba dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// de ni 'byung 'gyur mtshan ma dag/ bkres pa med cing zas kun ni// ring nas tsha zhing rgyur bcas 'ju// 'ju dang mi 'ju mi shos la// 'drangs par za yang mi
217a3(gso rig): nus shing // stobs ni rtag tu zad par 'gyur// cung zad bskyod kyang dbugs mi bde// bshang ba 'phel zhing 'gag par byed// rkang pa gnyis su cung sbyang // chu sor na zhing zas yang ba// cung zad zos kyang gsus pa rgyas// rtsa rgyas
217a4(gso rig): lto ba'i gnyer ma 'jig/ ces bya ba la/ dmu rdzings de nye bar 'byung ba'i mtshan ma 'am ma sngar byung ba'i tshul ni zas ma zos kyang bkres pa'i bag med pa dang / ro drug dang ldan pa'i kha zas kun kyang tsha ba dang bcas shing sgyur bag
217a5(gso rig): gi rnam pa ring zhig lon na gdong 'ju ba dang / zas zos pa zhu bar gyur tam/ zhu bar gyur tam/ zhu bar ma gyur pa'i blos rtogs shing shes par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'drangs par za zhing ljongs spyad par mi nus pa dang / lus kyi stobs
217a6(gso rig): nyin mtshan rtag tu zad cing 'bri bar 'gyur ba dang / lus skyong po'i g.yo 'gul gyi bya ba cung zad byos kyang / dbugs mi bde zhing rtseg pa dang / bshang pa nang du 'phel zhing sogs la phyir mi 'byung bar 'gags par dang de bzhin
217b1(gso rig): du rkang pa grang ba nas lto ba'i gnyer ma 'jig cing mi snang ba'i bar gyi mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ngasu rdzings nang ni thams cad la/ snyom zhing nyam chung 'gyur ba dang / dri ma sri zhing me drong chung // cha zhing skrangs la gsus pa
217b2(gso rig): spo du 'jug tu chu ni 'byung bar 'gyur// zhes bya ba la/ dmu rdzings thams cad kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid ma ni snyoms pa la sogs pa yin te/ snyoms pa ni gnyid kyis myos pa snyam du lus/ 'dzin par mi nus pa'i// tshwa ba ni lus tsha ba
217b3(gso rig): 'ur 'or pos khyab pa'o// dmu rdzings de dag thams cad kyi 'jug gam mthar ni lto ba'i nang du chu 'byung zhing des gang bar 'gyur ro// thams cad chu mid par tu smug/ skrang med khur ltar lci ba yin// rtsa 'dra'i skar khung
217b4(gso rig): r-is khabs// rtag tu sgra ni 'ur 'ur zar// rlung gis lte bu rgyu myur zug/ shugs bskyed nang ni 'jog par 'gyur// snying ga lte ba rkang pa dang // gzhang dang chu so na brir byed// rlung ni sgra dang bcas par rgyu// bshang ba 'gags
217b5(gso rig): cing gci ba nyung // me drung chung min skam pa min// khar ni ro blo myed pa yin zhes bya bo la/ dmu rdzing gi nang thams cad ni/ dmu chur ma gyur par sha mdog smug cing ngo mar bar snang la/ skrang pa'i cho ba mi che zhing cung zad skrad
217b6(gso rig): pa dang / khur bu ltar shin tu lci ba ma yin pa dang / rtsa 'dra ba'i tshogs kyis skar khung ltar g.yogs shing khebs pa dang / rtag tu dus thams cad du khong pa'i nang na sgra 'ur phur por grag cing bar snang gi 'brug ltar
218a1(gso rig): sgra grags pa dang / rlung lci ba drung rgyu mar zug cing na bar byed pa nas/ sgra'i shugs bskyed cing byung nas 'jigs te myi snang bar 'gyur ba dang / yang rlung gi snying ga lnga sogs par na zhing zug par
218a2(gso rig): byung ba dang / yang rlung de lto ba'i nang na sgra dang bcas shing rgyu ba'i ni nga phan tshun 'gro ba dang bshang ba 'gags shing sri bar byed pa dang / gaN+DIn gyi tsho gas nyung bar byed pa dang / khong pa'i me rnyong shin tu chung ba ma yin pa dang /
218a3(gso rig): skam zhing zas la gdu ba ma yin pa dang / khwa'i nang na ro bro ba med pa yin te/ ro dang bcas pa yin no// de la rlung gi dmu rdzi dzo ni// rkang lag rlig pa lte ba skrangs// lci ba rtsib logs rgyab na// tshigs rnams bye ba snyam du sems//
218a4(gso rig): lud pa skam zhing yan lag snyom// ro srung lci zhing bshad gci 'gags/ pags pa la sogs gnag la sleg+sa/ glo bur du ni 'phel zhing 'bri// gsus par zug tsang na ba dang / rtsa bran nag pos khyab cing rgyus// brdabs na
218a5(gso rig): rkyal ba dbugs kyis ni// gang ba lta bu'i sgra dang ldan// 'dir rlung dang nang dang sgrar bcas pas// thams cad du ni rgya bar byed// ces bya ba la/ de la dmu rdzings rnams kyi nang nas/ rlung las gyur po'i dmu rdzings ni rkang pa dang
218a6(gso rig): log pa la sogs pa skrang par 'gyur ba dang / lto ba la sogs pa na bar 'gyur ba dang rus pa'i tshig na zhing zhig pa snyam du sems po dang / lung pa bang kan med par skam por 'byung ba dang / yan lag snyoms shing grugs pa
218b1(gso rig): snyam du sems pa dang / lus kyi ro smyung lci zhing gdag dka' ba snyam du sems pa dang / bshad gci dri ma 'gag cing sri ba dang / pags pa dang sen mo dang mig dang lce dang bshang pa sogs pa mdog gnag cing skrag par snang ba
218b2(gso rig): dang rgyu med par glo bur du ngo'i lto ba tshod 'ag 'phel ni a sA wiSh+Ta 'gyur ba dang / zug cing shas cher na ba dang / rtsa bran gyi tshogs nag pos khyab cing rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / lto ba la lhag pa la sogs pas brdabs shing pi bsnun ni rgyal
218b3(gso rig): pab dbugs kyis gang ba la mnan pa lta bu'i sgra dang ldan pa dang / dmu rdzings 'di la rlung nA ba dang sgra drag pa dang bcas par thams cang du rgyu zhing 'gro bar byed pa yin no// mkhris pa'i dmu rdzings rims 'debs brgya la// lus
218b4(gso rig): tsha skom dang kha ro kha/ mgo 'khor tshad 'khru pags pa sogs// ser zhing gsus pa'i mdog rtsa sngo// rtswa mi dmar ser dag gis khyab// rdul dang tshwa bor bcas pa bskyeg/ dang 'byung reg na 'jam pa dang / myur du smon cing nyer
218b5(gso rig): gdung 'gyur/ zhes bya ba la/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'i dmu rdzings ni rims kyis 'debs pa la sogs pa 'byung ba dang / phyogs dang sen mo la sogs pa mdog pa mdog ser ba dang gsus pa'i mdog rtsa sngo bar snang
218b6(gso rig): ba dang / rtsi'i mdog dmor po dang ser po dag gos khyab cing khebs pa dang / lus rdul zhing tsha ba dang bcas pas me ltar bsregs par byed pa dang / ngang 'byung zhing du ba 'thul ba lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / reg na 'jam zhing
219a1(gso rig): mnyen pa dang / myur du smin cing chos par mi 'gyur ba dang / nye bar gdung zhing sreg par 'gyur ba yin no// bad kan dmu rdzings lbu tshig ma// tsher ba med cing sbrang la lci// gnyis che smon zhing yi ga 'chus//
219a2(gso rig): lung pA dbugs mi bad+me pags sogs// skya zhing lci ba mkhrang la snum// rtse yi ri mos khyab cing tshe// ring nas 'phel zhing sra ba dang // reg na grang zhing ga sus pa lci// zhes bya ba la/ pad kAn las gyur pa'i dmu rdzings ni yin
219a3(gso rig): lag gi lha tshogs na zhing snyom pa dang / tshor ba med cing bem bem por 'gyur ba dang sbyangs pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dang pags pa nas bashring gtsi'i bar du skya zhing dkar ba dang / lto ba sra zhing rem rem
219a4(gso rig): por 'dug pa dang / rtsa ris kyi bra ba mdog skya bas khyab pa dang / che zhing sbom pa dang / rnying zhing gnas 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang / rdo ltar sra ba dang / reg na grang zhing gsil ba dang / gsil ba dang / gsus pa lci zhing brtan
219a5(gso rig): pa yin no// gnas gsum 'khrugs pa de drung do// bud med kyis byin dri ma rdul// dbyig dug dug sogs kyis gnod 'gyur// khrag bcas dri ma bsags pa ni// ltor song gnod pa skyed byed de/ kha skam mgo 'khor
219a6(gso rig): brgyal bcas pa'i// rtags gsum ldan pa'i ngamu rdzing skyed// myur du smin cing mi bzod na// de ni grong dang rlung dang char// phrad pas shin tu gnang bar 'gyur// zhes bya ba la/ nad gzhi gsum skyed par byed pa'i rgyu nang
219b1(gso rig): thams cad kyis nang gzhi'i skabs su bshad pa rnams mang po de dang de dag dang / de bzhin du bud med kyis dbang du byas pa'i phyir/ srog chags kyi yan lag las byung ba'i sgra la sogs pa'i dri ma dang rdul 'byin par 'gyur
219b2(gso rig): bA dang / de bzhin du dbyig dug dang dug la sogs pa byin pas gnod par gyur pas khrag dang btsos pa'i rlung la segs pa'i nod kyi rlo ma bsags shing 'phel bar 'gyur ba de lto bar song zhing / phyin nas gnod po'i nad bskyed
219b3(gso rig): cing 'byung bar byed/ de kha skam pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i dmu rdzings nad gzhi gsum gyi mtshan ma dang ldan pa skyed par byed pa ni myur du smin cing brnag par dka' bar mi bzad par na ba yin no// yang dmu rdzings kyi nang do na
219b4(gso rig): grang ba la sogs pa dang phrad pas shin tu gnod cing nad 'phel bar 'gyur ro// mang du zos pas bskyod pa dang // gzhon pa khrog tu 'gro ba dang // las la ma nyal po drags pas dug// smyug spyan drags dang nad kyi skem// g.yon
219b5(gso rig): logs gnas pa'i mtshar ba ni// gnas las 'phos te 'phel ba dang / yang na dngas ma sogs pas khrug/ rgyus byed du ni 'phel 'gyur dang // de ni gtun bu bzhin rab sra// de nas ru spyil rgya ba 'dra ba// rim gyis 'phel
219b6(gso rig): bar gyur nas ni// lto bar dmu rdzings chags par byed// lung pa dbugs mi bde skom dang // kha yis ro ni mi tsher zhing // lci zhing na la rims kyis 'debs// sha mdog skya zhing mi sdug la// brgyal zhing smon par byed pa dang //

220a3(gso rig): dngas ma logs pa'i lus zungs rnams kyis khrag 'phel zhing rgyas par byas pa'i dbang gis mcher pa de 'phel bas gnas las 'phos pa 'am/ rang gi gnas nyid du 'phel bar gyur la/ de nas ni mtshar pa de dang

220a6(gso rig): lho lho sra yi ga 'chus// zhes bya ba la/ mcher ba'i sman de le rlung la sogs pa'i nang rnams ni rims bzhin du bshang ba 'gags pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin par shes par bya'o// de yang
220b1(gso rig): bshang ba 'gags pa dang nA ba dang / lto spros pa las ni rlung yin par shes par bya'o// rmod bag dang skom dang tshu ba dang rims kyis 'debs pa las ni mkhris pa yin par shes par bya'o// lus lci ba dang lho sra ba dang yi ga

222a1(gso rig): zhes zer ro// snum 'thungs la stsogs byas nas ni// 'phral bu chu grang 'thungs pa 'am/ me drong bri ba 'am ha cang ni// skom pas chu 'thungs drag pa las// rlung dang bang kan 'khrugs chur 'dres// chu yi lam ni

226a3(gso rig): pa dang yan lag la brtan cing gnas pa'i mkhris pas mog ser spyod par byed do// ci zhig byas nas skyed par byed ce na/ khrag dang shwa bsregs shing rlig par byas pas/ mig ser skyed par byed do// des ni mig dang pags pa
226a4(gso rig): gdong // bshang gci sen mo kha dog ser// lus tsha skom dad zas mi 'ju// sbal 'dra dbang po nyams chung 'gyur// zhes bya ba la/ mig ser gyi nang gyis mi'i mig la sogs pa ma ngag sor por 'gyur la/ de bzhin du lus
226a5(gso rig): la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang / sbal pa ser po lta bu'i mdog dang ldan pa dang / dbang po rnams nyam chung zhing rang gi yul 'dzin par mi nus pa yin no// de ni mkhris pa'i shas che nang // skra dra ba nang med par de 'byung // zhes
226a6(gso rig): bya ba la/ mig ser gyi nad 'di ni mkhris pa skyed par byed pa'i dngos po bsten pa dang mkhris pa'i rang bzhin shes che bas mkhris pa shin tu rgyas par gyur pas ni/ skya rbab kyi nang med par yang khong pa dang yan lag la brten
226b1(gso rig): pa'aM m+b+ha khris pa mig ser skyed par byed do// yal bar bor na char spangs te// gaspyo da mig ser 'od thabs yin// zhes bya ba la/ mrig ser mi nung de nyid gasngo ba ma byas par yal bar bor na tshabs cher skrangs par gyur pa
226b2(gso rig): da ni mig ser 'or thams tsong zhes bya ste// / de ni gso dka' zhing bcos par dka' ba yin+da nau// ha li sA ni ljang nAg ser// rlung mkhris mgo 'khor skom dang tsha// bud med la dga' rims chung 'dab
226b3(gso rig): khong rgyu me drod nyams stobs 'bri// hi la sa ka khrag ngan 'gyur// chu ser can zhes bya ba yin// zhes bya ba la/ gang gi tshe skya rbab kyi nad mkhris pa'i shas che bas ldang zhing gnas la ser bar 'gyur la/ rlung dang mkhris pa'i
226b4(gso rig): shAs tshe las mgo 'khor bya la sogs pa 'byung ba dang / rims cung zad cung zad tsam gyis 'debs pa dang / khyod rmya po la sogs par 'gyur te/ nang de'i ming ni ha lili sa ka zhes bya ba khrag rlan pa las gyur pA dang / de
226b5(gso rig): bzhin du chu ser can zhes bya'o// zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad do// de rnams kyo ni bla gnyen sngar// 'or na gtso bo yin par bshad// de phyir de nyid bshad par byed// zhes bya ba la/ skya rbab kyi nad de rnams kyi bla gnyam
226b6(gso rig): sngar 'chi ltos le'u yi stobs su 'or nang skyengs par kho na gtso bo yin par bshad cing bstan pas de'i phyir 'or nang skya rbab kyi 'og tu bshad pa'i cing bstan par bya'o// de yang skya rbab 'or nad bcas pa dang // mig dang
227a1(gso rig): sen mo ser bar snang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gis bstan pa yin no// rlung la khrugs gyur pas bad kan dang / khrag dang mkhris pa phyi rol gyur// 'phros byas de yang rgyun srung 'gags// pags/
227a2(gso rig): ba sha la gnas gyur te// 'or nad mthong zhing skrangs par byed// ces bya ba la/ rlung 'khrugs shing ldang bar gyur pas bang kan dang khrag da mkhris pa phyi rol gyis rtsi 'phros shing bya bar byas nas bad kan la sogs de dag kyang
227a3(gso rig): phan tshun 'gro ba'i rgyun srang 'gags pas pags pa dang sha la gnas te 'or rlung du 'gyur zhing mtho zhing mkhrang par gyur pa'i sbyangs pa'i nang du 'gyu ro// de bas thams cad 'dus gyur po shad// ces bya ba la/ rgyu de bas na 'or
227a4(gso rig): nad thams cad ni nad ga ni gsum pa 'dus las gyur pa yin no// zhes rgyun shes kyi bu la sogs pa'i drang srong rnams kyis bshad do// rgyu rnams kyi ni byeng brag lngas// gzugs 'byeng dgu yi bdag nyid can// nang gAzhi pa dang
227a5(gso rig): gnyis dang kun// snad dang dug gis phog las byung // zhes bya ba la/ 'or nad kyi rgyu so sor nges pa'i bye brag gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dbye ba rnam pa dgu'i bdag nyid can du 'gyur te/ de yang rlung la sogs pa nad gzhi tha dad pa
227a6(gso rig): las gyur pa gsumi dang gnyis gnyis 'dres pa las gyur po gsum dang / thams cad 'dus pa las gyur pa gcig ste/ de ltar bdun dang / snang ba las gyur pa dang / dug gis phog pa las byung ba gnyis te spyir dgu yino//
227b1(gso rig): yang na glo bur gnyis yan lag kun skad phyogs gcig gnyis dang / zhes bya ba la/ yang na 'or nad ni rnam pa gnyis te/ nang na rang la/ yod pa'i nyes pa'i gzhi las byung pa dang / glo bur ba'i nyes pa dug dang snang ba las byung
227b2(gso rig): ba ste gnyis so// yang rnam pa gnyis tau lus kyi yan lag kun skrad pa'i 'or nad dang / yan lag gi phyogs gcig tu 'byung ba'o// khyab dang mtho dang mdud pa yi// dbyibs kyi dbye bas gsum du'ang 'dod// ces bya ba
227b3(gso rig): yang 'or nad de ni khyab pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa gsum yin par drang srong rnams 'dod cing bshad de/ khyab pa ni rgya che ba'o// mthe ba ni grog mkhar ltar bgos kyis mtho ba'o// mdud pa can ni mdud pa lhor rdog
227b4(gso rig): rdog por 'dug pa'o// de ltar na khyad par de dog gis 'or nang ni rnam pa gsum yin par 'dod do// 'or nad kyi nI smr-i yi rgyu// nad las skyes pa khyad par nyid// nad la sa smyung sogs kyis nyam chung // myur du lhag par zas
227b5(gso rig): las 'byung // zhes bya ba la/ lhan cig skyes pa dang blo bur ba'i 'or nad thams cad kyi spyi'i thun mong gi rgyu ni 'og nas bshad pa yon la/ nad gzhi las byung ba'i 'or nad kyi mtshan nyid ni rgyu'i khyad par lhag pA gzhan
227b6(gso rig): yod de/ de bzhin du glo bur ba'i rgyu ni rims la sogs pa'i nad dang skyug sman la sogs po'i las dang / smyung ba byas shing zas bcad pa dang / sogs pa zhes smos pa las kyis du ba la sogs pa nyam chung zhing rid par
228a1(gso rig): gyur pa'i mis myur du ste/ de'i mang la zas drags par zlos na 'or nad skyed par 'gyur de nas gzhan yang lci ba dang / smyur dang snum bsil lan tshwa dang // thal sman rnon po tsha ba dang // mya ngan chu nyid drags dang
228a2(gso rig): yar zas zos sha lci shi skam dang // ma zhu del dang bud med grags// rkang gis lAm du 'gro ba 'am// gzhon pas drug tu bskyod 'gyur yi na/ zhes bya ba la/ de nas gzhan yang nad med par gnas pA dag gis kyang zas dang skom
228a3(gso rig): lci ba la sogs pa shas cher dregs pa bsnyen pas 'or nang spyad par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du mi zhu ba la sogs pas nang skying pa yin no// lung pa dbugs mi bde tshwa 'khru// gzhang 'bum lto ba'i nad dang ni// mngal nas khrag zags
228a4(gso rig): rims kyis btab// gsung dang chu ser slon nyes dang // sbrum mi dang ni mi dpal gyis// nad dang smya rtsub dag gis btab// gzhan yang log par gsos gyur pa'i// nang de brang du gnas na ni// stong skrangs chu sor gnas slad skrangs//
228a5(gso rig): dbus na gnas par rab tu sbyang // nying lag la brten de skyed byeng // ces bya ba la/ lung pa la sogs pa'i nang rnams dang / de las gzhan pa'i nad rnams legs par gsos shing sman dpyad kyi bsten bcos las ji skad
228a6(gso rig): bshad pa bzhin du gsos par gyur na 'or nad kyi rgyur 'gyur te/ rgyu des rlung la sogs pa'i nad 'khrugs par 'gyur ba de brang na gnas pa lus kyi ro stod kyi cha skrangs par byed la/ chu sor gnas na gang la gnas na chu
228b1(gso rig): so man chad kyi ro slang skrangs par 'gyur ro// dbus tAM/ lte ba dang rkeng pa'i phyogs su gnas na lus kyi phyogs su skrang bar 'gyur ro// lus kyi yan lag kun la khyab par gnas na thams cad sgrud par 'gyur ro// yan lag re rI'i ny-id
228b2(gso rig): gnas na gang la gnas pa'i nying lag nyid sgrud par byed par 'gyur ro// de'i sngon tshul rtsa rnams tsha// yan lag snyoms par byed pa yin/ zhes bya ba la/ 'or nad kyis sngon du byung ba'i tshul ni mig la sogs pa'i rtsa rnams shin tu ma
228b3(gso rig): par tsha ba dang / yan lag rnams snyom zhing na bar byed pa yin// rlung las skrad pa 'ipho zhing rtsub// spu rtsub smug cing gnag pa dang // pags la bu mos 'dar rtse reg na na// na zhing thugs la bim bem po// myur bar ldang zhing myur ba 'ipa
228b4(gso rig): mnan na dma' bar 'gyur// snum dang dro bas mnyes na zhi/ mtshan mo chung zhing nyin mo che// pags pa yungs kar lde gu yis// bskus ltar tsha ba tsag tsag byed// ces bya ba la/ rlung las gyur pa'i 'or nad ni 'pho zhing gnas
228b5(gso rig): pa dang / reg na rtsub pa dang / spu rtsub par gnas pa dang / mdog smug cing gnag pa dang / pags pa 'khums shing gnyer ma yod pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang / de bzhin du myur du ldang zhing 'byung la/ myur du rab tu zhe
228b6(gso rig): 'gyur ba dang / skrangs pa'i phyogs lag pas mnan na dma' zhing ku bkung por 'gyur ba dang / snum bskus shing drod bag tu byas te mnyes na zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / mtshan mo skrad pa'i bri zhing chung la/ nyin mo skrang pa che zhing 'phel
229a1(gso rig): dang / pags pa yang yungs kar btags pa'i lde gus bslus pa ltar tsha ba tsag tsag byed pa dang ldan pa yin no// mkhris pa rtswa ser dmar la gnag/ s+phu ni dmar ser gyur pa dang // myur du ljang dang zhi mi 'gyur
229a2(gso rig): dang por dbus su byung dang srab// skom bcas tsha zhing rims 'debs rdul// ma nom zhing 'dul la snum mgo 'khor// bsil beg 'dod cing thur du 'khru// dri mnam reg na mi bzod 'jam// zhes bya ba la/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'i 'or
229a3(gso rig): nad ni mdog ser po la sogs par snang ba dang / spu'i mdog dmar ser du gyur pa dang / myur du lding zhing 'byung ba dang / zhi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / thog mar dbus kyi phyogs nas skung zhing mtshang ba dang / pags pa slab pa la sogs
229a4(gso rig): pa dang ldan pa dang / reg na mi bzod cing na la 'jam zhing mnyen pa yin no// bad kan g.ya' spu lpags pa dkar// mkhrang zhing bsil la lci ba dang // snum zhing 'jamo la brtan zhing 'thas// gnyid che smon zhing me drod nyams// mnan
229a5(gso rig): na mi 'bying ljang dka' zhing // zhi dka' mtshan mo skrangs tshabs che// 'od ma btsags bu sogs drul yang // khrag mi 'byung bar spyi bag 'dzag/ dri dang reg pa la mngon dga'/ zhes bya ba la/ bad+ma kan las gyur pa'i 'or nad ni skrad pa
229a6(gso rig): g.ya' ba dang / spu dang pags pa dkar zhing skya ba dang / mkhrang zhing sba ba dang / snum pa la sogs pa dang ldan zhing / gnyid che ba la sogs par byed pa dang / mnan na 'bying zhing spo bar mi byed pa dang / ldang zhing skye ba dang zhi
229b1(gso rig): bar dka' mtshan mo sbyangs tshabs che zhing nyin mo sbyangs tshabs chung ba dang / 'od ma'i tshol ba dang / botsag bu la sogs pas dpral ba// yang khrag mi 'byung bar ring zhig na sbyin byug na lha nal po 'byung ba dang / dro bA la dga' ba dang /
229b2(gso rig): reg cing byugs na dga' ba yin no// gnyis byung gsum por ji bzhin pa// rgyu dang mtshan ma 'dren ma yin// zhes bya ba la/ nang gnyis las byung ba'i 'or nad gsum ni rgyu dang dbyibs kyi mtshan mAr dang ldan pa yin no// 'dus pa kun
229b3(gso rig): gyi bdag nyid can zhes bya ba la/ 'dus pa las gyur pa'i 'or nang ni mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan pa'i bdag can yin no// mtshon la sogs pas snang gyur cing // bcad dam dpral lam smras laM la sogs// kha ba me dang rgyu mtsha
229b4(gso rig): rlung / bas rtsi ka pi ka chu yi// khu ba gra ma sogs reg pas// sgrub pa mched par 'gyur ba yin// shin tu tshu zhing dmar bar snang // phal cher mkhris pa'i mtshan nyid can/ zhes bya ba li/ mtshon cha la sogs pas snad cing
229b5(gso rig): rmarmed rma phyung la/ bcad pa dang dpral ba dang rma phug pa la sogs pa las byung ba'i 'or nad dang / sogs pa smos pas brdungs pa dang / bcag pa dang / bsnun pa dang / lhung ba dang / bcings pa dang / dkris pa la sogs
229b6(gso rig): pa bsdu'o// de bzhin du kha bas phying pa dang / mes tshig pa dang / de bzhin du rgya mtsho las byung ba'i rlung gis phog pa dang / bse shing gi me tog dang brang chu sa phog pa dang / ka pi ka chu'i zhes bya ba kha srel phre'u ang ma
230a1(gso rig): sgrub ta ces bya ba'i bla ma rag na yang snang bar 'gyur zhing/ smu pa de phan rgyun mched cing bye bar 'gyur ba dang / shin tu ma 'ang dro ba dang / mdog dumar par snang ba yan la/ pha la myur ta ma du m+b+ha khris pa d+ma
230a2(gso rig): mtshan ma nyid 'dra ba yin no// drug skyes srog chags dug can ni/ lus la saM dang gcin gyis phog/ srog chags dug med pa yi yang // so dang mche ba sen mos zug/ gcin rtug khu bas dmas pa dang / dri ma can gyi gos gyis reg/ dug
230a3(gso rig): gis rlung la reg pa dang // dbyub dug phye mas reg las byung // mnyen zhing g.yo la 'phyang ba dang // myur gsong che zhing na bar byed ces bya ba la/ dug las skyes pa'i 'or nang ni sbrul la sogs pa'i srog chags dug can gyis reg cing lus
230a4(gso rig): la song ba dang / de bzhin du de'i gcin gyis phog pa dang / srog chags dug med pa dog gis yang gcin dang rtug pa phog po dang / yang zhes smras pa ni dug dang bcas pa bsdu bas te/ de dag gi so dang mche ba dang / sen mos zin cing
230a5(gso rig): zug pa dag kyang 'or nang du 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gcin dang rtug pa dang khu chus dmas par byas pa dang / de bzhin du dri ma dang bcas pa'i gos kyis reg pas kyang 'or nang du 'gyur ro// de bzhin du dug gi shing la reg pa dang / dug
230a6(gso rig): dang 'dres pa'i rlung la reg pa dang / de bzhin du dbyig dug sbyar mar byas pa'i phye mas reg pa las kyang 'or nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// skrangs pa de ni mnyen zhing 'jam pa dang / g.yo zhing 'pho ba dang / 'phyang bag tu gnas pa dang
230b1(gso rig): myur du gsod par byed pa dang / tshwa bar byed pa dang / na bar byed pa yin no// 'or nang gsar byung bla gnyen med// gso sla zhes bya ba la/ 'od nad gsar du byung zhing skyes nas ring por ma lon pa dang / bla gnyen gyi nad gzhan gyis ma gtsos pa dag
230b2(gso rig): na gagaso bar sla zhing sman dpyad kyis btsos par nus pa yin no// gso dka' sngar bshad zin// zhes bya ba la/ 'or nad gso bor mi rung ba ni sngar lus kyi 'gyur ba bshang pa'i le'u'i skabs su// bla gnyen du mar ldan pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs
230b3(gso rig): pa'i gzhung gis bshad cing bstan zin pa yin no// me dpal nang rnang snang ba'i bar// gnod pa'i 'or nang mtshungs pa yin zhes bya ba la/ me dpal gyis nad ni nang gzhi so so dang gnyis 'dres pa dang / thams cad 'dus pa las gyur pa
230b4(gso rig): dang / snang ba'i bar las byung ba ste// me dpal rnam pa brgyad yin no// de bzhin du gnod pa rlung dang bad kan dang mkhris pa la sogs pa las gyur pa'i 'or nad dang mtshungs shing 'dra ba yin no// de ni phyi na gnyis ka ste/ gsum
230b5(gso rig): na gnas pa yin par bshad// ces bya ba la/ me dpal de ni phyi la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa gsum yod do// zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad de// la la ni phyi rol na gnas pa yin la/ la la ni nang na la la ni gnyi ga na gnas
230b6(gso rig): pa yin no// phyi ma bzhin du gso bar dka' zhes bya ba la/ me dpal de yang phyi ma bzhin du gso zhing bcos par dka' ste/ de yang phyi rol na gnas pa pas ni nang na gnas pa rab tu gso bar dka' la/ nang na gnas pa las ni gnyi
231a1(gso rig): ga na gnas pa mchog tu gso bar dka' ba yin no// de la nad ni ji bzhin du// 'khrugs pa'i rgyu yis lhung gyur la// khyad par du ni tsha ba yis// lus la myur du mched par byed// de yang nang gnas nang du mche
231a2(gso rig): phyir gnas phyir gnyis kar mched gnyis kar gnas// gnyis gar mched par byed pa yin// zhes bya ba la/ mi dpal gyi nad dri ni rlung lnga sogs pa'i nang rang rang gi rnam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'khrugs shing g.yos par 'gyur
231a3(gso rig): bo'i rgyu kha ba dang tsha ba dang bska ba la sogs pa'i rgyus ldang bar 'gyur la/ khyad par du ni tsha zhing sreg par byed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi sman dang zas dang / spyod lam gyis ldang zhing nang nges lus la myur du mched cang rgyas par
231a4(gso rig): byed do// de yang ji ltar mched ce na/ nang na gnas pa'i me dpal ni nang na mched cing rgyas par byed la/ phyi rol tu gnas pa ni phyi rol nyid du mched la/ gnyi gar gnas shing rten pa ni phyi dang nang gnyi gar mched cing rgyas par byed pa
231a5(gso rig): yin no// de la nang na gnas pa ni// gland rnams tshwa gdung myos par byed/ bu gA rnams la gnod pa dang // skom dang rab che gAci nau nang sogs// mi snyo mas par ni 'byung ba dang // me drod myur nyams las shes bya// zhes bya ba lo/
231a6(gso rig): de la nang na gnas pa la sogs pa'i me dpal gyi nang nas/ nang na gnas pa'i me dpal ni gnad rnams tsha ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma las shes shing rtogs par bya ste/ snying la sogs pa'i gnad rnams tsha zhing sdug bsngal
231b1(gso rig): gyis gdungs pa dang / myos shing rmongs bag tu byed pa dang / nang du bu ga'i sgo rnams la gnod cing gzir la khyad par du spyod pa dang / de bzhin du skom dang lhag par rab tu che ba dang / bshang ba dang gci ba la sogs pa'i shugs mi snyoms
231b2(gso rig): shing legs par mi 'thung ba dang / khong pa'i mo drid dang lus kyi stobs shin tu myur bar nyams pa las shes shing rtogs par bya'o// phyi rol de la sa bzlog pa yin zhes bya ba la/ phyi rol tu gnas pa'i me dpal gyi mtshan nyid
231b3(gso rig): ni nang na gnas pa'i me dpal gyi mtshan nyid las go bzlog pAR+Sha 'gyur pa yin prar shes par bya'o// dwe la rlung gyur me dpal ni// rlung gi rims dang nang thabs 'dra// skrang zhing 'gul l-i zug pa dang // yan lag snyoms zhing ba spu rtse/
231b4(gso rig): zhes bya ba la/ de lA ma dpal gyi nang rlung las gyur pa ni rlung gi rims dang na ba'i mtshan nyid 'odra ba yin par shes par bya la/ yang de bzhin du med pal de ni skad pA laM sogs dang yang ldan pa yin no// mkhris rtswa gyur myur du mched
231b5(gso rig): cing 'gro// mkhris rims rtags ldan shin tu dmar// zhes bya ba la/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'i me dpal ni lus la myur du mched cing khyab par byed pa dang / mkhris pa'i rims kyi mtshan nyid/ ji skad smos pa'i rtags dang ldan
231b6(gso rig): ba dang / shin tu shas cher dmar be yin no// bad kan las g.ya' reg na 'jam// bang kan las byung rims 'dar na// zhes bya ba la/ bong kan los zung ba'i me dpel ni shas tshar g.ya' ba dang / rig ni 'jam pa dang / bad kan
232a1(gso rig): las byung ba'i me dpal dang rims dang tshul 'dra zhing mtshungs pa yin no// me dpal sogs kun yal bar byor// rang gi nang tshul bsags gyur nas// de ni smin+da rtol rang rang gis// me dpal rma'i mtshan
232a2(gso rig): nyid yin// zhes bya ba lA/ mAM dpal thams cad yal bar bor zhing gso ba ma byas ma// rang gi nang rlung la sogs pa'i tshul bsags shing 'phel bar 'gyur te/ rlung gi mtshan nyid kyis ni rlung gi me dpal 'phel bar 'gyur la/
232a3(gso rig): mkhris pa'i mtshan nyid kyis ni mkhris pa'i me dpal 'phel zhing gsogasngo par 'gyur la/ bad kan gyi mtshan nyid kyis ni bad kan gyi me dbul la sogs par 'gyuraro// de bzhin du smin cing rdol ba ste/ dang por smin nas
232a4(gso rig): phyis rdol bar 'gyur ba yin pas na sbyin cing brdol ba zhes bya'o// de bzhin du rlung las gyur pa rang rung gi rma'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de 'dzin cing 'phyang bar byed/ rma'i le'u las/ de las rlung las sngo nag smrig pa
232a5(gso rig): dong zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / mi khris pa lngas gyur smyon zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'og nas smos pa yin no// rlung mkhris las ni rims 'debs sko na// brgyal zhing chad 'khru skom mgo 'khor// rus tshogs
232a6(gso rig): chags snyom me drod nyams// mun zhugs snyam sems yi ga 'chu so// yan lag thams cad me mingag ni// 'bar bas khyab pa lta bur tsha// phyogs ni gang dang gang du mched// khyab pa'i yan lag de dang ngo // me mangs
232b1(gso rig): zhi zla ltar gnas pa 'am// sngo ba'am dramar bas khyab byed lnga// me bsregs lta bur mched cing 'byung // myur du mched cing khyab par byed// nad kyi rjes 'jug me dpal ni// de nas stobs rab skyes pa'i rlung // yan lag na zhing dran pa stor//
232b2(gso rig): gnyid yar dbugs kyi rngam po drag/ skyigs bus 'dabos shing 'di lta bu'i// gnas skabs des ni thob por 'gyur// sa dang mal blo stan sogs pa// gang du'ang bde ba mi 'thob cing // 'greng zhing sdug bsngal myong ba dang // lus
232b3(gso rig): sems ngal las byung ba yi// gnyid kyi rmong bag sang dka' ba// de na me 'dra'i ma dpal yin// zhes bya ba la/ rlung dang mkhris pa las ni me dang 'dra ba'i me dpal du 'gyur la/ de yang rims kyis 'debs pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang
232b4(gso rig): lus kyi yan lag thams cad me mngag 'brar bas khyab cing gtong ba lta bur rab tu tshwa ba dang / yong me dpal de lus kyi phyogs gang dang gang du ma ched cing khyab po'i lus kyi yan lag gi phyogs de dang de me mngag 'bar ba zhi ba bzhin
232b5(gso rig): du gnag cing sngo ba dang dmar bas khyab par byed par bor 'gyur ro// yang me dpal dI ni mes bsregs pa lta bur chu bur gyis myur du mched par byed cing kun tu khyab par byed par 'gyur te/ de yang rlung dang mkhris pa'i rgyu nyid kyis
232b6(gso rig): myur ba kho nar khyab par byed pa yin no// yang de bzhin du snying la sogs pa'i gnad kyi rjes su 'jug par byed cing mi dpal des/ de'i 'og tu stobs rab tu skyes pa'i rlung des yan lag na zhing gzer bar byed pa dang / dran pa stor
233a1(gso rig): zhing brgyal bar byed pa dang gnyid yar zhing med pa dang / dbugs kyi rnam pa drag tu 'byung ba dang / skyigs bu'i nad kyis 'debs pa dang me dpal gyi nad dang ldan pa'i skyes bu de 'di lta bu'i gnas
233a2(gso rig): skabs 'thob cing myong bar 'gyur te/ semos mal na bde bar mi gnas pa'i dbang du gyur pas/ sa dang mal khri dang snyan pa lo sogs pa grang du gnas su zin kyang lus dang sems bde bar mi 'thob pa yin la/ de ltar mi
233a3(gso rig): bde ba nyid kyis phan tshun 'dre zhing ldog pa sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba nyams su myong ba dang / lus dang sems ngal zhing dub pa las byung ba gnyid kyi rmod bag nyams su myong zhing / de yang sad par shin tu dka' ba yin no// bad
233a4(gso rig): kan gyis ni bkag pa'i rlung / khang kan daM bau rtol mang du byed// khrag 'phel po yis khrag gtor te// pags chu sha la gnas shing / gnod byas thor bu phra zhing ring // zlum zhing sbom la sra ba yi// mdzer pa'i phreng ba chags
233a5(gso rig): byed cing // mdog dmar rab na rims kyis 'debs// lung pa dbugs mi bde tshang 'khru// kha skams skyigs buM slon mgo 'khor rmong bag mdog nyams brgya la dang lus// yan lag na zhing me drod nyams// de ltar mdzer
233a6(gso rig): bo'i me drod 'di// bad kan rlung 'khrugs las gyur yin// zhes bya ba la/ bad kan dang rlung 'khrugs pa las ni mdzar pa'i me dpal zhes bya ba'i nang du 'gyur te/ de yang bad kan gyi nad kyis rlung de bkag cing 'byung du mi
233b1(gso rig): ster ba dang / rang gis pad kan+da de brtol cing phye nas dum bu mang du byas pa'am/ yang na khrag 'phel bar gyur pa'i mi'i khrag phye zhing dum bcu gtor nas mdzer pa'i phreng ba 'am tshun bu'i phreng ba skyed par byed do// de yang pags
233b2(gso rig): pa la sogs pa la gnas pa'i khrag gnod cing 'khrugs par byas nas/ thor bu phra ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can dang mdog dmar ba'i phreng ba 'chags par byed la/ mdzer ba'i phyed pa dro yang nong du na zhing rims kyis
233b3(gso rig): 'debs pa la sogs par skyed par byed de/ de ltar bshad pa'i me dpal 'di ni bang kan dang rlung 'khugs pa las gyur pa yin no// bad kan mkhris pa las rims 'debs rengs// gnyid che slong bag klad pa na// yan lag
233b4(gso rig): na zhing bya rmyang 'dod// bla zhing mgo 'khor yi gA 'chus/ rtsub cing drong nyams rus chag snyam// skom zhing dbang po mi gsal lci// be'u snabs 'khru zhing dang gA 'khyil// de ni rtsa sbubs rnams su 'gro// phal cher ma zhu
233b5(gso rig): gnas nang zhugs// phyogs gcig tu ni rab min// thor bu ser po dmar po dang // kar pos phyogs kun khyab par byed// nor bu wAr snying gnag cing snum// dri ma tson la sbyang zhing lho// be'u snrubs brnags pa'i zabs
233b6(gso rig): tshe rab tu tsha// reg na 'dzag cing brnags pa dang // 'das ltar na zhing zhig gyur cing // rtsa rgyus gsol bar snang po yin/ mi yi ro ltar ma nim ma dpal// de ni 'dam 'dra zhes byar bshad ces bya ba la/ bad kan dang mkhris
234a1(gso rig): pa las ni 'dam 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i me dpal 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de yang mtshan ma rims kyis 'debs pa la sogs pa snang ste/ yan lag na zhing bya rmyangs byed 'dong pa ni phan tshun rkyong zhing 'degs
234a2(gso rig): par byed pa'o// rus pa chag pa snyam sems pa ni rus po dkrums pa snyam du byed pa'o// dang ga 'khyil pa ni zhal zhal byas snyam du sems shing bang kin la sogs pa 'khyil pa'o// mi dpal du yang phal char ma zhu ba'i gnas nu ma
234a3(gso rig): dang lta ba'i bar zhugs nas/ de'i phyogs gcig la brten te lhag par na bar mi byed do// yang na de bzhin du thur bu mdag ser po la sogs pas khyab cing gang bar byed pa dang / nor bu'i mdog lta bur snang ba ste/ gnag
234a4(gso rig): cing sir skyar snang ba dang / phal cher mdog nog po dang / smug por gnas pa dang / dri ma can la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang / brnags pa'i zabs che zhing nang du nub pa dang / shos tshar rab tu tsha ba dang / lag pa lI sogs pas
234a5(gso rig): reg 'adz+ri gi tsi'i nyams la brnags pa 'dum ltar gnas shing shA rnams shig par 'gyur pa dang / de nyid kyis rtswa rgyus la sogs pa gsal bar snang zhing gsal ba dang / mi ro ltar shin tu mnam zhing dri nga ba'i me
234a6(gso rig): dpal gyi nang de ni 'jam 'dra ba'i me dpal zhes bya'o// zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad zin to// kun skyes mtshan nyid kun dang ldan// lus zungs kun li rab khyab byed// ces bya ba la/ me dpal nad gzhi kun las skyes
234b1(gso rig): ba nad gzhi gsum char gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin la/ yang des ni lus zungs thams cad la khyab cing mched par byed pa yin no// phyi yis rgyu yi rmas las 'khrugs// khrag bcas mkhris pa skyed byed de// me dpal du ni
234b2(gso rig): rlung gis byed// rgya sran ku lang+tha 'dra ba'i// 'brum bus khyab skrangs rims 'debs na// shin tu tshal dmar zhing sngo// zhes bya ba la/ phyi rol gyi rgyu mtshon cha la sogs pas smras par gyur pa las rlung 'khrugs par gyur na khrag/
234b3(gso rig): dang bcas pa'i mkhris pa bskyed cing 'phel bar byas nas mi dpal gyi nang rlung gis bskyed par byed la de yang skyes na ku lang+ga 'dra ba'i 'brus phran gyis khyab cing khebs par byed pa dang / skangs pa la sogs pa'i mtshan
234b4(gso rig): nyid dang ldan pa yin no// nang dmigs tha dad las gyur gsum// gnyis gyur blo gnyen modo gso sla// zhes bya ba nang dmigs tha dad pa las gyur pa'i me dpal gsum skyed cing gso bla ba yin// de bzhin du nad gzhi gnyis 'dres
234b5(gso rig): ba las gyur pa'i me dpal bla gzhan med pa dag kyang gso sla ba yin no// de lu bcu brnyan ni lus kyis 'gyur ba shes pa'i le'u las spros pa'i skems pa dang khri dog mi sdug pa la sogs pa yin no// rma dang 'dus pa
234b6(gso rig): las byung dang // thams cad gnang ni khyab pa dang // rtsa dang chu ba sha 'drul dang // mi ro'i dri 'dra rul gso dka'// zhes bya ba la/ me dpal gnyis po rma'am gnang ba'i nang las byung pa dang 'dus pa las byung ba gso bai
235a1(gso rig): yin no// thams cang du nang kAzhi tha dad pa dang nang gzhi gnyis las byung ba'i me dpal thams cad kyang gnad rnams khebs shing khyab pa nI gso da/ R+Sha la/ de bzhin du sa stsogs bu 'phrul zhing zhig pa
235a2(gso rig): yang gso ba'o// de bzhin du khyad par mi ro'i dri 'dra zhing shin tu mnus pa de yang gso pa// ra ba yin mo// / yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam pa 'grelnga pa tshig gi don gyi zla zar zhes
235a3(gso rig): bya ba/ slob dpon zla bA la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las nang gi zhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gsum pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o// de nas mdze dang sha ba kra gzi gu dang srin bu'i nang gzhi bshang bar bya'o zhes
235a4(gso rig): bya ba la/ pags pa'i nang du tshul gcig pas mau dpal gyi rjes la mdze nad la sogs pa ston pa'i le'u brtsams pa yin no// kha zas spyod lam ldog pa dang // khyad par du ni mi 'phrong bstan// dam pa smong dang srog gcod
235a5(gso rig): dang gzhan gyi nor 'phrog sogs bsten dang // sdig pa'i las ni 'phral byas dang // sngon chad byas pas nang bslang nas// rtsa la thang kar grom nas ni// sha dang pags pa chu ser khrag/ gnod byas sla bar gyur nas ni// de
235a6(gso rig): nas phyir 'byung 'gyur te// pags pa'i mdog ni mi sdug byed// mi bzad de ni mdze ru bshad// ces bya ba la zas dang spyod lam log pa ste/ zas grang ches pa dang tshe tshes pa dang / ya ba ka la sogs pa zos
235b1(gso rig): pa dang / de bzhin du spyod lam log pa ste/ gsod ba dang rku ba la sogs pa'i sdig pa byas pa dang / khyad par du yang kha zas dang nya dang 'o ma lhan cig bza' ba dang / sbrang rtsi dang rlan can gyi sha lhan cig zos pa la sogs pa mi
235b2(gso rig): 'phrong ba'i rnam pa zas kyi le'u las smos pa lta bu bsten pa dang / de bzhin du khyad par du 'gal bar byed pa'i spyod pa byed cing / rnam par mtsha zhing gzhan la gnod pa dang / tshig rtsub por smra ba dang / gzhan la gnod par sems pa

235b5(gso rig): rnams phyi rol tu byung zhing thon par gyur te/ pags pa'i mdog mi sdug cing snga ma las gzhan du gyur pa'i mdog du mar byed pa'i nang de ni mdze zhes bya'o zhes dang drang srong chen po rgyun shes kyi bu la sogs pas bshad// gang phyir

236a1(gso rig): mdze zhes bya bar bsha // lus zungs la zhugs nang du khyab// thang 'drul bar byed par 'gyur// rdul bcas rul cing brnag pa dang // srin bu phra mo mi bzang bskyed// spu lpags chu ba rtsa chen dang // rus pa snyi ba rim bzhin za// de bas
236a2(gso rig): bkra pi rol te/ mdze las gzhan ni yin par bshad// ces bya ba la/ mdze'i nga nad de dngas ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs thams cad du zhugs shing nang du khyab par byas nas lus zungs de dge thams cad 'drul zhing gsher bar byas nas lus la
236a3(gso rig): 'bu skyed par byed la/ 'bu de yang shin tu phra ba dang / mi bzad cing brnag par dka' ba'i nad skyed par byed pa des sru la sogs pa za bar byed cing / rus pa sI bo'i rna ba dang sna'i phyogs na gnas pa'i rus pa mnyen pa la bya ste de dag za bar bya'o// de
236a4(gso rig): bsar+m+ma de'i phyi sha bak+Sha ni 'drul ba dang 'o bu la sogs pa med/ de bags pa'i phyi rol tu gnos pa ni mdze las gzhan pa yi no/ zhes drang srong rnams kyis bi sha // nang gzhi tha dod 'dres pa dang // 'dus gyur mdze nang rnam pa bdun zhes bya'o// mdze
236a5(gso rig): nad ni rnam po bdun yod de/ nang gzhi tha dad pa rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan las gyur pa gsum dang / nyes pa de dag nyid sna gnyis gnyis 'dres pa las gyur pa gsum dang / de gsum char las 'dus pa las gyur pa gcig ste de ltar bdumo/ kun

236b1(gso rig): 'dogs pa yi mo// rlung gi mdze ni thod pa 'dra zhes bya ba la rlung gi shas che ba'i dus pa las gyur pa'i mdze ni thod pa 'dra ba zhes bya'o// mkhris gyur u dum+bA ra te/ zhes bya ba la/ mkhris pa shas che ba'i dus pa las gyur pa'i mdze ni u dusmA ra zhes bya ba 'byung

237a1(gso rig): dkar po dang / ri sh+ya'i lce zhes pa pa ste/ bdun po 'di dag ni mdze nang chen po zhes bya ba yin par shes par bya'o// mdze nang sngar byung mtshan ma ni// shin tu 'jam pa'am reg na rtsub// rdul 'byung mi 'byung mdog mi sdug/ lus tsha g.ya' zhing pags tshor

238a1(gso rig): tad ni ga nang mi 'gyur ba dang / 'bras shing skra bar chags pa dang / lci ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can dang / phan tshun gcig la gcig 'dab 'brel bar skye ba dang / shub sbro zhing gyen 'byung ba dang /
